name: Discovery Set
categories: Fragrance, Value & Gift Sets, Perfume Gift Sets
about: Set Description:Explore the DedCool universe with six of their bestselling vegan, genderless scents to wear alone or layered together. This set includes Fragrance 01 TAUNT, Fragrance 03 BLONDE, Red Dakota, Milk, Xtra Milk, and their newest fragrance: Sunlit Blooms..About the Bottle:DedCool reimagined fragrance to be way more functional and unique to you. Nontoxic, vegan, genderless. Endless combinations combine to create a signature scent that really feels like you..About the Fragrance:Fragrance 01 TAUNT has notes of bergamot, vanilla, and amber. Fragrance 03 BLONDE has notes of black violet and saffron. Red Dakota has notes of gardenia, amber, and bergamot. Sunlit Blooms has notes of orange blossom, white floral, and salty vanilla. Xtra Milk and Milk have notes of amber, bergamot, and white musk..This Set Contains:- 6 x 0.05 oz/ 1.5 mL Fragrances in Fragrance 01 TAUNT, Fragrance 03 BLONDE, Red Dakota, Sunlit Blooms, Xtra Milk, and Milk
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Fragrance (Parfum), Borago Officinalis Extract, Sambucus Nigra Flower Extract, Camellia Sinensis (White Tea) Leaf Extract, Equisetum Arvense Extract, Punica Granatum Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract (Decolorized), Ginkgo Biloba Leaf Extract, Trifolium Pratense (Clover) Extract, Althaea Officinalis Root Extract, Rosa Canina Fruit Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Humulus Lupulus (Hops) Extract, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Root Extract, Macrocystis Pyrifera (Kelp) Extract, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Ilex Paraguariensis Leaf Extract, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Fruit Extract, Fucus Vesiculosus Extract, Malva Sylvestris (Mallow) Extract, Porphyra Yezoensis Extract, D-Alpha Tocopherol...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Spray as desired on skin and clothing...Recycling Instructions:.-PACT partnership.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had high hopes for these, reading the notes. And like that it's clean.   But every scent faded very quickly, and there wasn't one I really liked anyhow. Although in saying that one is very overwhelming. I couldn't even put it on.   For reference, my favourite scent is Replica, By the Fireplace. I liked a couple bold Commodity scents too.  And the samples here are really small.
these smell good, but the packaging needs work. one came broken, so I got a  replacement, and when the replacement came, the exact same one was broken.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoy all of these fragrances, but unfortunately, as many have already mentioned, milk & xtra milk smell nonexistent on my skin! I sprayed the tester in-store, and I loved it, but weirdly enough, didn't smell a thing once I tried the discovery set? My favorite is Sunlit Blooms,(it reminded me of those cupcakes dolls from the 90s..), but it doesn't have any staying power. I'm kind of just overall disappointed with the brand because of this.

reviews.review_title: Love the scents but blonde arrived broken
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These are all gender neutral scents that can be worn on anyone and anywhere. I absolutely love what the brand stands for. But Iu2019m sad to say shipping may have been a little too rough with my package. Blonde 03 arrived broken. A bit saddened by that mishap, but apart from that the set is great!! Highly recommend!!

reviews.review_title: One of my favorite fragrance discovery sets!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After working in the beauty industry for more than 18 years, I have tried many fragrances! DedCool truly makes some unique, beautiful fragrances that can be worn by anyone. I love that all of their scents are gender neutral, and to me that is how they feel.  This DedCool Discovery Set has something for every mood. The Milk and Xtra Milk are two of my all time favorite fragrances. They are warm, enhanced skin fragrances that feel comforting but also sexy. They also work wonderfully as a base for layering with other fragrances. I like to spritz either Milk or Xtra Milk on right after the shower, let it settle for a bit and then layer whatever other fragrance Iu2019m in the mood for on top.  Red Dakota is one of my other favorites from the set. The clementine and gardenia are so bright and joyful. This fragrance immediately boosts my mood and leaves me feeling confident!  I also recommend DedCool to friends and clients. Between their thoughtful ingredients and fantastic fragrances they are truly one of a kind!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This sample kit is great, good variety of scents- but they also all work well together too. Xtra milk is sO delicious, definitely my favourite, already bought the full size. Theyu2019re also long wearing.

reviews.review_title: Didnu2019t work out, but Taunt is still a favorite

reviews.review_text: I love Taunt which I discovered from getting a free sample and so I thought Iu2019d try out the other scents in this sampler, but sadly none of them come even close to it. Milk and Xtra milk smell like nothing to me, and I'm familiar with skin scents, Blonde smells like a cucumber cocktail (def get why people said picke juice), the rest are ok but nothing special

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thought this perfume set was excellent! I donu2019t particularly like strong smells so I loved that these fragrances were mostly fresh or lighter. Loved them all except Fragrance 03 u201cBlondeu201dwhich smelled like straight up pickle juice to me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Because of this discovery set, I bought 3 travel sized sprays. Taunt, Xtra Milk and Red Dakota. The scents are unisex but dry down well and last forever. Most of them are u201cskin scentsu201d which to me are clean, inviting, warm and sensual.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a new perfume girly, its really hard to figure out what types of fragrances I like. IIt was super easy after getting the DedCool Perfume Discovery Set and I must say I was pleasantly surprised. It's a set of six fragrances, each with a unique scent. The names of the fragrances are Fragrance 01 TAUNT, Fragrance 03 BLONDE, Red Dakota, Milk, Xtra Milk, and Sunlit Blooms. My favorites are Xtra Milk, Sunlit Blooms, and Taunt. They are great for layering and give a long-lasting scent. I love that you can try all of them for a low price before committing to a full-size bottle. I've already purchased backups of Sunlit Blooms, it's my favorite! Overall, I highly recommend this set to anyone who loves to experiment with different fragrances.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I grew up wearing cologne, perfumes and fragrances since I was a baby. As I grew I continued with my love of everything fragrances. I am always looking for and trying new scents to use and wear. Dedcool is a fairy new brand for me to try. I have heard a lot of good things from the Dedcool brand and its fragrances. If there is a good way to test out new scents itu2019s definitely with a discovery set. The set comes with six different fragrances. The six scents included are: Taunt - has notes of Bergamot + Vanilla + Amber, Blonde - has notes of Black Violet + Saffron, Red Dakota - has notes of Gardenia + Amber + Bergamot, Sunlit Blooms - has notes of Orange Blossom + White Floral + Salty Vanilla, Xtra Milk and Milk - has notes of Amber + Bergamot + White Musk. I have to say that my favorite scents were Taunt and Red Dakota. I enjoyed mostly everything about the fragrances m, but do wish they last longer on me. I understand that they probably donu2019t last as much because they are made with non toxic, vegan and cleaner ingredients. The great thing about the Dedcool brand is that itu2019s genderless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved most scents in this collection. Wasnu2019t a fan sadly of the milk scents. Very subtle and couldnu2019t really smell anything. Sunlit Blooms is my next purchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The DedCool Discovery Set is a delightful introduction to the brand's unique and captivating fragrances. From the moment you open the box, you're greeted with an array of enticing scents that promise to transport you to different realms of olfactory delight. Each fragrance in the set offers a distinct personality, allowing you to explore and find your perfect match.What sets the DedCool Discovery Set apart is its commitment to clean, vegan, and cruelty-free formulations. You can indulge in these luxurious scents with peace of mind, knowing that they're crafted with high-quality, ethically sourced ingredients.From fresh and invigorating to warm and sensual, there's a fragrance for every mood and occasion in this set. Overall, the DedCool Discovery Set is a fantastic value and an excellent way to experience the brand's artisanal fragrances firsthand. It's perfect for anyone looking to expand their scent wardrobe or simply indulge in a sensorial journey of discovery.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I want to say that the tin container is one of the most unique packaging Iu2019ve ever seen for a fragrance sampler set. Itu2019s very sturdy, and I had a little bit of a hard time opening at the first time around, but I figured it out. Definitely childproof. Here are my thoughts of each fragrance in order of worst to best:  Blonde makes me feel like I shoved my head into a cluster of herbs like an ostrich. VERY green and earthy. Personally I donu2019t like this one on me, itu2019s my least favorite, but I can see the allure.  Red Dakota reminds me of eating a grapefruit in the hot summer while sitting at the base of a cedar tree. Iu2019ve actually done that before when I was younger so itu2019s nostalgic. The scent is confusing because my memory wants to love it but my nose isnu2019t the biggest fan.  Taunt is very subtle. Itu2019s warm with a hint of sweet, but I canu2019t pinpoint any particular notes necessarily. The sweetness and warmth does grow the longer it sits on my skin though. This one is ok, but not my favorite.  Sunlit Blooms is a fruity floral scent that reminds me of candy like sweet tarts. Itu2019s perplexing but delicious at the same time. Itu2019s also a tad bit sharp, but not headache inducing, so I think I like this in my top 3.  Xtra Milk is definitely earthy and musky on me. I also smell a very small hint of sweet and citrus, but itu2019s pretty much all woods. Iu2019m growing to like this one. I didnu2019t at first but now Iu2019m reaching for it more and more. Itu2019s my second favorite.  Milk is very very undetectable but I can sense the correlation to Xtra Milk. Itu2019s just musky, but itu2019s good! I honestly like this one the most because of its versatility.

reviews.review_title: the perfect way to pick a signature
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dedcool I am very happy with this set of fragrance samples from dedcool. They come really nicely packaged in a tin, and I love that they list the main notes right on the package for you to reference.  Taunt is a warm,  cozy amber and vanilla fragrance.  It's not overpowering but it does last a good handful of hours.  It has a slight sweetness to it, but it's subtle and definitely not cloying. It's a warm cable knit sweater on a chilly fall day. Blonde is really gorgeous as well it's a little earthy and sexy,  black violet and saffron. It's definitely more floral.  It gives a leather jacket on a cool spring evening.  Red Dakota is very citrus to me.  Thankfully, the gardenia isn't overpowering, and it stays bright and lightweight.  Perfect for a late spring into summer fragrance.  Sunlit blooms is definitely a sweet summer floral.  It's almost candy-like with that sweet orange blossom opening up into the vanilla.  But not so far that I would call it a true gourmand because of the florals.  Milk, if I understood correctly,  is kind of the mother fragrance of the line.  A scent that the other fragrances are built around. It has a bright sweet bergamot opening and a warm amber base. There's a kind of cozy skin musk that makes it feel like a very personal fragrance.  An easy everyday scent or perfect for layering with the others. Finally, Xtra milk is the bolder, older sibling of milk.  It has a little more warmth and depth to it,  in my opinion.  The amber and musk sit close, but linger all day.  It's the scent version of pulling your favorite bathrobe out of the dryer and wrapping it around you while it's still warm.   I personally would consider all of these fragrances to be very unisex and appropriate for anyone.  I think this set is the perfect introduction to the brand and each of these fragrances,  as well as the whole line as a set to layer and match together.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who is super picky and sensitive to fragrances, and has tried soooooo many, this sampler is amazing! I love the little reusable tin they come in and the scent selection. I love that the scents are vegan, planet positive and gender less. There isnu2019t a scent that turns me off. They are all fresh and unique but not overpowering or off-putting. There is fruity, floral, gourmand and fresh/clean options for everyone. My favorite is probably red dakota because I enjoy the light fresh florals and spring time vibes it evokes. Taunt is a nice warm gourmand experience that makes you feel cozy. Milk and xtra milk are fresh and clean and neutral. Sunlit blooms is summertime in a bottle. And blonde is that mature fragrance great for a first date or an interview. Great lineup!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Finding the right perfume to match your personality is hard! Which is why i love when brands have an option to try out samples of their signature scents before committing to a full size! This set has been my go to with deciding which layers better with my other perfumes! My favorite so far is definitely u201cxtra milku201d! Itu2019s the perfect layering scent iu2019ve found for all of my perfumes! It gives me a light creamy musk that isnu2019t to overpowering so my other perfumes can still shine through! In my expert opinion this is the best set iu2019ve seen so far! There is something for everyone no matter what gender! I also have to add that these are bigger samples than what you are usually given! If youu2019re in the market to find your new unique signature scent this is the product for you! It has an amazing variety of scents designed to make your scent 100 times better!

reviews.review_title: A gorgeous addition to my perfume collection..
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After being gifted these products to try, I have a new love and appreciation for Dedcool as a whole. It's amazing that these scents are layer-able and waterless. I'm sure a lot of perfume brands dilute their fragrances with lots of water which diminishes the strength and longevity so I like that Dedcool didn't compromise. It's a little pricey for a sample kit but I think I've seen more expensive ones. I don't know if I would repurchase for that reason, so that is my only criticism. My favorite scent might have to be taunt. However, all of them are wonderful in their own unique way, and I would wear them for ANY occasion. It's great that the tin can be repurposed after the samples are used also! I like that brands are being more eco-conscious. Dedcool is definitely a brand whose direction other brands should follow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such an array of wonderful scents. it was so hard to even choose my favorite, glad I didn't have too because I loved every single one of these, which I did not intend on because I am very picky about what I put on and it is safe to say this brand nailed it the woman who made this really thought about not just women, but men as well and the whole fact that these are not just for one gender is wonderful. I personally think that this is some thing that needs to be done more. I would have to say my favorite of all of these which was really hard to choose cause they're all amazing. But I have to say taunt is really unique and I just love the smell and it isn't just one scent you're getting it's multiple notes and you really want that with the perfume because it just makes it the scent that much better. 809/750 characters

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This set of perfumes has several different types of scent from sheer to strong and i love it because it is great to try out the samples before investing your money into a full sized perfume. This set has seven assorted different perfumes and the packaging is quite cute. My personal favorite from these are red dakota and xtra milk. Sometimes I mix and match and use them together to create a unique scent. All these scents have long lasting effect. I will recommend it specially to people who love to travel. The best thing is these scents are genderless and are non toxic and vegan. I will recommend these scents to everyone. Myself being a fragrance lover I am very happy to add these amazing scents to my perfume collection. I have been receiving a lot of complements at work.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a 32 year old beauty enthusiast and I live in Arizona. I have an affinity with perfume. I like to change my scent based on how I am feeling (or want to feel), where I am going and what I am doing. I like to be able to smell the fragrance on me but I donu2019t want to overwhelm others and make their eyes water.  I am obsessed with DedCool. As a millennial myself I can really relate to the brand and its aesthetic. I have a total crush on Carina and her company. I love the tin that you can get 6 mini fragrances of so that you can play with the fragrances, see how they wear on your skin during the day and even experiment with layering them to see how you can create a different experience. The tin that they come in is so cute and totally something to reuse. I think itu2019s a perfect case that I can throw in my bag with cash and cards - especially if I donu2019t want to take my whole wallet.  I like that the sample fragrances are all different. My favorite is the new fragrance, Sunlit Blooms. It smells like an orange creamsicle in the best way.  I also really like Taunt. Itu2019s no surprise itu2019s a best seller. It is a lot more subtle than Sunlit Blooms. Itu2019s a softer, more subtle fragrance from the start. I like that itu2019s a mix of floraly,  citrus thatu2019s warm and sweet. Itu2019s almost as if all the scents are on the same playing field and there isnu2019t one scent that stands out and overpowers the other.  I am so glad that Xtra Milk was created. I find Milk is too subtle for me and I like the extra life that Xtra Milk brings out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These perfumes are so unique! I love how theyu2019re waterless, vegan, non-toxic and genderless. I can tell theyu2019re handcrafted and better quality than a lot of other perfumes. Theyu2019re so light and each of them have their own unique scent. I personally love the Fragrance 01 u201cTaunt.u201d Iu2019ve been carrying it my bag and using it everyday and itu2019s the perfect every day signature scent. The Xtra-Milk smells like Strawberry Boba and comes out white and milky. Itu2019s so refreshing when I put it on! The milk scent smells similar to extra milk, just not as intense. Theyu2019re all a perfect balance of ingredients and Iu2019d say Iu2019m a fan. As a beauty enthusiast, Iu2019ve tried many perfumes over the years and these are the coolest so far! The sizes are so cute and perfect testers.

reviews.review_title: Great opportunity to try new scents
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love trying out new beauty products and smelling amazing, so I was ecstatic when I got this set. I love this DedCool Discovery Set, it gave me the perfect opportunity to test out 6 different scents before purchasing a full size bottle. My favorites are definitely XTRA Milk, Milk and Red Dakota. XTRA Milk is now my new scent, and is just tantalizing. Milk is just as amazing as XTRA Milk just with a lighter scent. Red Dakota has a citrus scent like grapefruit mixed with cologne, I actually really like this one. I was not fond of Sunlit Bloom, nor was my husband. It smells more like an air freshener not something you would want to put on your body. It has a floral scent to it. Blonde reminds me of something my grandma wears. Taunt kind of has a powdery scent and is just ok in my opinion. They come inside this cute little tin which can be used for storing little items. Considering I loved 3 out of 6 scents I would say this set is a win because without it I never would have known that I like these.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love to have a good collection and variety in my fragrances. Dedcool is such a fun and innovative line- I love that they are unisex, clean and meant to be cocktailed. Itu2019s always best to a Spritz perfume straight onto skin vs clothing. I did notice this base has a lot of oil on it and will leave a slight oil behind on your skin but I didnu2019t notice it stain my clothing. This discovery kit is so fun and allows you to find the scent you like best or see what they smell like layered.  I realllllllly love the packaging of this product, it reminds me of an old school matchbox itu2019s so cute! Iu2019m super impressed with these and the variety and things you can do with layering and mixing them. I love these discovery sets because itu2019s so fun to experiment and not commit to a full bottle. They also make the perfect gift!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a stay-at-home mom to two boys and love trying new products for skincare, makeup and hair care. I have recently gotten into exploring fragrances and I am so happy I got to try this Discovery set from DedCool. It is such a nice way to try a variety of their fragrances without having to spend a tonn of money on full size bottles.  This discovery set has 6 fragrances (1.5 ml each) and they range from warm and cozy to fresh and floral which means there is something for everyone. Here are the fragrances that are part of this set: TAUNT, BLONDE, Red Dakota, Sunlit Blooms, Xtra Milk, and Milk. I love that these fragrances are unisex so the whole household can share and enjoy. I also liked that you can layer these scents or use them by themselves. I am still trying to figure out my favorite from this set but Taunt and Sunlit Blooms are my top 2. Overall, I am really enjoying this discovery set and can see myself going for a full size bottle of a couple of these scents. I love the variety this set offers and the convenience of carrying these around or for travel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This sample set by Dedcool is perfect. I love sampling fragrances, and the vials are of decent size and arrived full.  Among these scents, Fragrance 03 Blonde was my clear favorite. Its notes of Black Violet and Saffron make it a unique find. It strikes a perfect balance, neither too floral nor too spicy. I can see myself wearing it throughout the year and on different occasions.  It is closely followed by Sunlit Blooms, a striking, addictive floral with an interesting twist of salty vanilla. Orange Blossom and white florals make it a romantic, sunny composition.  Milk and Xtra Milk are great skin scents that are subtle on their own and amplify the other fragrances when layered.  Red Dakota is amazing layered with 03 Blonde, in my opinion.  Dedcool is vegan and uses plenty of often organic, natural extracts in its compositions.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: For quite some time, I had been searching for the perfect fragrance that would match my taste. However, despite my efforts, I had not been able to find one that truly captivated me. Fortunately, I stumbled upon Dedcool from a group, and I must say that their range of scents is simply amazing.  What I loved most about Dedcool's fragrances is the variety they offer. From warm and cozy to fresh and flirty, they have it all. Each scent is unique and has its own distinctive aroma that can appeal to different tastes. I found myself enjoying every single fragrance that they offer.  In particular, the fragrances of Taunt and Xtra Milk were already on my radar, and they did not disappoint. They were as amazing as I had expected them to be, with their warm and inviting scents that made me feel cozy and relaxed. However, I was not expecting to be blown away by the other three scents.  The other three scents - Blonde, Sunlit Blooms, and Red Dakota - caught me by surprise with their alluring and captivating aromas. Blonde had a fresh, citrusy scent that was perfect for a sunny day out. Sunlit Blooms had a floral scent that was both sweet and refreshing, while Red Dakota had a warm and woody aroma that was perfect for cozy nights in.  Overall, I was incredibly impressed with Dedcool's range of scents. They offer something for everyone, and I would highly recommend them to anyone who is looking for a fragrance that truly matches their style and personality.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hi everyone! From the moment I became a cosmetologist, I have been super intrigued with skincare and finding new product that works for me to be able to share with friends, family, and clients. I was beyond excited to be able to try out DedCool Discovery Set. I absolutely love the idea of the Discovery Set because it makes it easier for us to try each scent out without having to fully commit to a big bottle without knowing if Iu2019m gonna like how it smells through the day. It also makes it easier for someone traveling that doesnu2019t like to stick to one perfume only to take different scents with them throughout their trip. Although all the scents in this set are good I do tend to always run back to one in particular. The packaging is amazing but I did have a hard time opening it since I donu2019t have much strength in my hands at the moment and you have to squeeze both sides in order to open.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: With DedCool creating quite a buzz lately, I couldn't resist delving deeper into their fragrance offerings, and that's precisely why the DedCool Discovery Set caught my attention. The thoughtful packaging made it incredibly convenient for on-the-go use, and the size of each scent was just right for sampling and deciding on personal preferences.  What added to the allure of this set was the detailed information on the back of the packaging, providing notes for each fragrance. This feature proved immensely helpful in deciding which scents I wanted to layer together for a more personalized experience. The cohesiveness of the set, from its packaging to the carefully curated scents, created a seamless and enjoyable exploration of DedCool's olfactory offerings.  Having dipped my toes into the world of DedCool with the Discovery Set, I'm eagerly anticipating trying more of their products. It was an enriching experience that left me excited to further explore the diverse and captivating fragrances that DedCool has to offer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a 30 year old female and I love collecting perfumes. I was extremely excited to try dedcool as it is genderless, has sustainable packaging and waterless. The discovery set is perfect to explore what sescool has to offer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's not one favorite that this set brings, it brings many favorites all in this small tin can set. The DedCool Discovery set comes with six tiny fragrances all are unique in their own bottle. The Xtra Milk has a soft lovely fragrance that brings happiness and joy. The Milk is soft and light and can be used for daily use. The Sunlit Blooms smells of a floral basket sitting by your bedside. The Red Dakota has a strong cinnamon and spicy smell that can help for sassy and sexy night outs. The Fragrance 03 Blonde smells of running through a floral garden of beautiful flowers. The Fragrance 01 Taut has the softest fragrant but light enough to wear after showering on your day off and finding a quiet place to relax. All the smells bring confidence and makes me feel beautiful. The small compact case is great for traveling and the bottles pack a punch of essence and style. The scents can be used on the body and clothing with the best results. I love that they are longwearing and long-lasting.

reviews.review_title: Awesome option for those with commitment issues!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Ded Cool discovery set is a delightful introduction to the brand's diverse range of scents. As a fragrance enthusiast, I appreciated the opportunity to explore multiple fragrances without committing to one blindly. Each scent offers a unique olfactory journey, from the fresh and citrusy to the warm and woody. The packaging is sleek and compact, making it perfect for travel or gifting. I like the attention to detail with the harder to open top on the tin so it does not open up in my baggage and leak.  My overall favorite would still have to be the Xtra Milk. These fragrances can be layered to make your perfect signature scent.  Overall, the Ded Cool discovery set is a must-have for anyone seeking variety and quality in their fragrance collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i actually think that perfume goes a long way but I only use a spritz sparingly here and there:  i am also not an everyday user so little sample sizes are plenty for me. I love this sampler from dedcool because it allows me to experience their entire line up in this adorable little tin and I can easily gift something like this and give exposure to a brand that my friends might not have heard of before.   I think the blonde is my favorite of the bunch. The milk and extra milk are quite similar; the xtra has more musky notes which might be a more night time kind of scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This discovery set included Red Dakota, Blonde, Taunt, Sunlit Bloom, Milk and Xtra Milk.  So, getting down to the basicsu2014u201cRed Dakotau201dwas a classic dry floral bursting wjth warm amber and gardenia notes; itu2019s bright, sunny and free. Thereu2019s also a hint of peppery undertones as it dries down. Paired with either of the laying scents (milk and xtra-milk), you get a spicy and warm musk.  u201cBlondeu201d smells like California; the rich violet and saffron are silky subtle, cool and refreshing. Paired with the layering scents, the saffron is more augmented and the violet is softened.  u201cTauntu201d is a sweet fragrance with a fruity vanilla (rather than floral) and a sort of nutty undertone thatu2019s afforded my the mix of the amber and bergamot. Itu2019s nearly a gourmand fragrance with caramel notes. Pairing with either of the laying scents softened the sweet notes and accentuated the florals a bit more.  Finally, u201cSunlit Bloomu201d has strong orange floral notes, with notes of amber and perhaps gardenia; it also seems to have a very subtle white musk bottom note. Paired with either of the layering scents, it simply became a stronger floral scent with augmented orange floral notes.  u201cMilku201d and u201cXtra Milku201d are both clean white, bergamot musks that smell like the ideal wash day; they are fresh, bubbly, and lightu2014u201cXtra Milku201dis the same as u201cMilku201d but stronger, and I notice that it lasts for at least a day.  Overall, each of these scents were a 10/10; all of them were unique, lasted all day and had a personality of their own. I highly recommend the Dedcool Discovery Set for playing with fragrance and creating your signature scent!  Note: the container was super cute and will be so fun to recycle! My only concern is for individuals who are differently able who may have trouble opening it; there needs to be a more accessible alternative.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am not sure if it's just me, but the tin was pretty difficult to open at first! I do kind of have weak hands/fingers, so that may be why. I do love the tin idea though, it reduces packaging waste and is a nice way to store them out of light as well as carry them around.  All of these scents were very strong, in a good way. The sampler sizes definitely give you enough for at least 3 wears out of it. I love that these are non toxic, vegan and made in the U.S!  Fragrance 01/taunt- smells like a sophisticated vanilla- its sweet, but not too sweet and no spiciness. Almost reminds me of melted ice cream. It is definitely something anyone of any age can wear as its not too sweet. I could not stop smelling my wrist!  Fragrance 03/Blonde- smells floral and orangey its very good! Its a nice light scent almost like water lily or peony. I get hints of vanilla or something sweet in here as well.  Sunlit blooms- smells familiar, but different and it is quite intoxicating. Bits of orange in there and almost some bubblegum scent on my skin (a mature bubblegum).  Milk- this really does smell like milk. It would be a great base to mix with other scents but it also very good on its own. This smells clean sweet and warm.  Red Dakota- my least favorite. A bit too intense and strong for me at first- intensity calmed down after dry down. This reminds me of candied oranges and clean. This smells very expensive after dry down. Definitely could be masculine or feminine.  Xtra milk- Delicious reminds me of ice cream in a waffle cone (not syrupy a true waffle cone) or like sweet cereal in milk. It smells different than just the milk it is not just an intense version to me. Definitely more sweet smelling than just vanilla and this swings more feminine.  For me, my favorite layering was milk plus taunt to give me a nice clean, sugary, vanilla scent. I also liked milk plus blonde for when I want to have a more floral scent but still a little bit of sweet vanilla scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This discovery set is SUPER COOL and SUPER CUTE! I Love the packaging to this it is very sturdy so super great for travel! I really loved the scents in this and a couple actually are great for layering! I'll start with the xtra milk and milk: the xtra is a more potent and citrusy version on the original i feel. The original Milk has a bit of a sweeter or warmer soft fade out while I feel the xtra Milk stays suuuper fresh and bright.The Sunlit Bloom :is a warm, floral that has a deep solar floral scent and is a tad bit earthy! Red Dakota: Started out as a very bright but heavy floral that didnt tickle my nose but after the wear about 30 mins in it softened up so much that is smells like a warmer more sweet floral without it smelling like too much candy. Blond: This one faded very different on me than anything I've smelled on myself before. It seems very spicy fresh which is right up my alley now and I love the warmth with what smells like a bit of pine.  The taunt is a very clean, fresh spring scent that has a hint of sweetness balancing it out so it doesn't just smell like clean laundry it is a bit more complex than that so this I think is a very unique scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This brand is new to me and I love how they represent the brand and products so well and simple. I really impressed with this discovery set of Dedcool. My top 2 favorite are Milk and Extra Milk. And my less favorite is Sunlit Bloom. I think it is too much on floral note.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been in the beauty industry for over seven years, I have recently discovered this brand and I have become obsessed with their scents! I love that it is a non-toxic vegan formula that is unisex. This is a great for someone like myself who is new to trying this brand and is unsure of what scent to get before commiting to a full-sized. I have tried multiple of these and it is hard to pick my number one favorite! I take it with me on-the-go in my purse and work bag, it goes with me everywhere. I find that the scent lasts a long time, however after awhile when you get used to the scent and you no longer smell it on yourself, others around you can still smell it. I have had multiple people compliment me when I wear these scents. I like spraying it in the mornings before I leave my house or if I forget then I just take it out of my bag and quickly spray myself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: DedCool was making their mark when they made this discovery set. I was so impressed with the DedCool story itu2019s truly the way of if you want to do something then do it. Iu2019m so obsessed with the packaging the purpose of making it reusable and not just thrown in the trash is just amazing. It makes me excited that itu2019s genderless and that you can layer the scents together. I have never tried any other perfumes that you can layer together to this was awesome to play with to find unique scents that go together. I had tried two of the scents before and that was the Extra Milk and the Sunlit Blooms. I really enjoyed the Extra Milk but the Sunlit Blooms for me was a bit too floral but I did enjoy the vanilla in it. In this Discovery Set I fell in love with Taunt and Blonde. Oh my goodness Taunt is that vanilla sweet yet very natural scent of the bergamot and amber itu2019s was definitely unique. The Blonde scent was very gravitating Iu2019ve never smelled anything like it black violet and saffron itu2019s pure amazing. The Red Dakota was pretty good too I enjoyed it for layering with other scents. Of course the Milk is great with any any scent even by itself. These scents are so unique i highly recommend giving this a try so you can see which say you would like together.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My mom and I absolutely adore the smell of the fragrance Taunt 01 and Sunlit Blooms! I think it's mostly because these were the ones that smelled the most feminine and has such girly vibes! Taunt 01 smells very warm and spicy with a hint of vanilla. The notes of salty vanilla, white florals, orange blossom really ties Sunlit Blooms all together! Iu2019m in-love with this and I could definitely see myself using this during Spring. Red Dakota one smells citrusy which kind of reminds me of Dolce Gabbanau2019s Devotion perfume. I know itu2019s extremely difficult to nail this kind of scent because sometimes it would just smell like orange. Is it just me or Blonde 03 smells like beans for some reason? Was not a fan of that. The OG Milk one is a less strong version but definitely has more of a milk layering in it than the Xtra Milk. I could definitely see mens wearing Xtra Milk but not myself, it has a very strong masculine scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let's start with the excitement of discovering new fragrances through a convenient discovery set, which also doubles as a charming reusable tin.  The discovery set features six scents: Fragrance 01 Taunt, Fragrance 03 Blonde, Red Dakota, Sunlit Blooms, Milk, and Xtra Milk.  Fragrance 01 Taunt exudes a delightful feminine charm without overwhelming the senses. Its vanilla notes evoke a sweet and youthful vibe, perfect for teenagers.  Fragrance 03 Blonde presents a blend of citrus, earthiness, and musk, leaning towards a more masculine scent profile.  Red Dakota offers a hint of floral essence, notably gardenia, though its musky undertones may deter those who prefer lighter floral fragrances.  Now, onto SUNLIT BLOOMSu2014an absolute delight! Its sweet, floral aroma, reminiscent of cotton candy, reminded me of something I would have worn as a teenager. I will for sure add this to my fragrance collection!  On the other hand, Milk boasts a subtle, barely-there scent, ideal for those who prefer a delicate fragrance experience.  Lastly, Xtra Milk delivers a fresh, clean, universally appealing scent. While it's not my cup of tea, it's a solid choice for anyone who appreciates simplicity and freshness.  Great gift for a teenager, woman, or someone who loves fragrances!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a fantastic way to sample all of the perfumes from the brand DedCool, especially if you are trying out the brand for the first time! Just like with trying new makeup, I really enjoy trying new fragrances. This set gives you a wonderful variety to try without having to commit to a larger size or can give you the ability to rotate different scents. It is also a great way to wear the fragrance to see if you actually like it, instead of trying to smell each fragrance in the store. Not to mention, this discovery set has the cutest and convenient packaging. The tin can be a tiny bit hard to open at first. Itu2019s a great size to throw in your bag and take with you. In my opinion, most of them smell really nice and I think a lot of people would enjoy this set.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: DedCool's Discovery Set is an olfactory adventure that beautifully encapsulates the brand's commitment to minimalism and sophistication. The curated selection of fragrances offers a diverse range of scents, each a unique scents . From the earthy warmth of Fragrance 01 to the citrusy vibrancy of Fragrance 05, every scent in the set is a discovery in itself. The compact and sleek packaging is not only aesthetically pleasing but also travel-friendly, allowing you to explore these scents on the go. What stands out is the brand's dedication to clean and cruelty-free ingredients, ensuring a guilt-free indulgence in luxury. The lasting power of these fragrances is impressive, evolving gracefully over time. The Discovery Set is a testament to DedCool's mastery in crafting scents that transcend trends, making it an ideal choice for those seeking a timeless olfactory experience. This set has become an integral part of my daily ritual, offering a sensory journey that is both personal and indulgent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The DedCool Discovery Set is a fragrance a connoisseur's dream come true! As someone who adores exploring different scents, I loved this curated collection of best-selling fragrances packaged for experimentation. It's like having a perfume playground at your fingertips, allowing you to mix and match to uncover your own unique signature scent. What I love most about this set is its affordability and accessibility. It's the perfect way to try different scents without committing to a full-sized bottle upfront. Personally, I really liked Fragrance 01 Taunt for its alluring blend of notes, as well as the captivating allure of Red Dakota and the uplifting aroma of Sunlit Blooms. Each fragrance offers a distinct experience Whether you're a fragrance enthusiast or a newbie to the world of perfumery, the Discovery Set is a must-have addition to your collection. Trust me, you won't be disappointed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Dedcool Discovery Set offers a unique opportunity to explore a range of scents from the brand's collection. The set includes samples of Fragrance 01 Taunt, Fragrance 03 Blonde, Red Dakota, Sunlit Blooms, Milk Layering Fragrance, and Xtra Milk. Each fragrance in the set offers a distinct olfactory experience, allowing you to discover and appreciate the diversity of Dedcool's offerings.  Fragrance 01 Taunt is a bold and seductive scent that combines notes of citrus, jasmine, and sandalwood to create a sophisticated and alluring fragrance. Fragrance 03 Blonde is a fresh and vibrant scent with notes of bergamot, neroli, and musk, perfect for those who appreciate light and airy fragrances.  Red Dakota is a warm and spicy fragrance with notes of tobacco, leather, and vanilla, evoking a sense of mystery and intrigue. Sunlit Blooms is a floral and feminine scent with notes of rose, jasmine, and cedarwood, ideal for those who enjoy floral fragrances.  Milk Layering Fragrance offers a creamy and comforting scent that can be layered with other fragrances to create a personalized olfactory experience. Xtra Milk, on the other hand, combines notes of bergamot, white musk, and amber to create a luxurious and captivating scent that is both sophisticated and versatile.  Overall, the Dedcool Discovery Set provides a comprehensive introduction to the brand's diverse range of fragrances, allowing you to explore and appreciate the artistry and craftsmanship behind each scent. Whether you prefer bold and seductive scents or light and airy fragrances, this set offers something for every fragrance enthusiast to enjoy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The perfect place to start. Hi my name is Kaisa. I have always loved scents and a wide array of them. Over the past year I have come to love the brand Dedcool. I love how down to earth the founder is and how she really makes an effort to have clean ingredients that work. I was thrilled when I learned about the DedCool Discovery Set. It is the perfect thing if you are brand new to the brand or if you love everything about it. It gives you a good range of smells to play around with and test out to see which one you really love. I also love that you can layer the scents and it isn't over barring or too much. I absolutely love the cute travel tin that they come in and I know I can repurpose it when my sprays are out. Overall, I love this product. I think any age or gender can use this pack. I can honestly say I didn't have a scent I disliked in this pack!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a 20-year-old college student, I'm always on the hunt for the latest and greatest in fragrance. That's why I was stoked to get my hands on the DedCool Discovery Set. This set features six of their bestselling vegan, genderless scents that you can rock solo or mix and match for a totally unique vibe. First off, let's talk about the scents themselves. You've got classics like TAUNT with its vanilla and amber notes, and BLONDE which has this dope black violet and saffron combo. Then there are the newer ones like Red Dakota (gardenia and amber = swoon) and Sunlit Blooms (hello, orange blossom and salty vanilla!). And of course, you can't forget Xtra Milk and Milk with their warm, musky vibes. What's really cool about DedCool is that they're all about letting you create your own signature scent. Mix a little of this with a dash of that, and boom u2013 you've got a fragrance that's totally you. And let's be real, who doesn't want to smell fresh and unique? On top of that, these scents are vegan and nontoxic, which is a major plus in my book. No sketchy ingredients, just good, clean fun. The only downside? These little bottles are tiny, so you might find yourself going through them pretty quickly if you're a fragrance fiend like me. Overall, if you're looking to switch up your scent game and stay on-trend, the DedCool Discovery Set is definitely worth a try. It's a great way to experiment with different scents and find your new signature fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So many scents to explore and the combinations are endless. I have many more mash-ups to swing, but so far my favorite has been the Blonde and Xtra Milk. A close runner-up has to be Taunt and Milk. Both options are so playful and unique. Sunlit Blooms is so bright and bold, itu2019s a great fragrance to spritz on when I need a pick-me-up. Itu2019s truly bottles up joy. Loving the portable carrying case too, as itu2019s ideal for tossing in my purse, giving me endless options to consider when wanting to touchup or create a mood on-the-go. Love this sampler for the variety, and it enables me to test drive so many profiles in an affordable and fun way. The scents are so original and I appreciate how my clothing always smells terrific at the end of the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was given the chance to try this discovery set and I was quite impressed. I love that they come in a metal tin, which is great for storing and travel. The scents that are included in the discovery set are divine! This is the best way to get to know the brand and get to experience each scent. I have come to love almost all of the scents in this set. I have already made a full size purchase of the Blonde.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First off let me start by saying how much I love trying new perfumes and how cool this is to be able to try so many at once for a good price at that! I love the idea of this sample pack the packaging is super nice and easy to put in your purse or store in your car & even better for traveling. Each of these scents smelled amazing ranging from all different types of notes there is literally a scent for everyone in the discovery pack! My favorite scent was taunt, it was super warm and vanilla smelling, a great comfort smell. My second favorite scent was red Dakota it was so fruity smelling which I absolutely love a good fruity perfume! My favorite thing about these fragrances is that they are buildable with any of your other favorite perfumes I love to use the extra milk on top of one of my other go to perfumes I have. Overall the discovery set is great for someone wanting to try dedcool, I would definitely recommend this to anyone shopping around for different perfumes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The DedCooL discovery set is a beautiful introduction to the brand and the perfect way to find your signature scent. Both myself and my husband love fragrance and because these are genderless scents we get to enjoy them together. Like all fragrances you can wear them alone or pair together , I instantly fell in love with all of them but I found my perfect combo being milk and xtra milk for everyday wear while my husband prefers red dakota and taunt. The tin case is very durable and convenient I carry it on me everywhere I go and it fits perfectly into a small pocket on the side of my purse and once the vials are empty I can repurpose the tin case. The DedCooL discovery set offers 6 unique scents that now hold new memories with me and allowed me to find the newest addition to my collection without having to blind buy.

reviews.review_title: The perfect addition to any makeup kit
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not going to lie. I love this little Dedcool' Discovery set. It's so fun and all the scents are so good. I love wearing them separately but layering them is my favorite. My favorites change often too. For the most part I think these lean towards feminine scents. I was just trying it out for fun and had my son and husband go through them and see if there was any they would wear and they both picked Red Dakota. It's probably the most masculine scent in the set but if you layer it with Taunt or Sunlit Blooms it's a perfectly feminine scent. Im going to be so upset when these are gone because it's just so fun to get up everyday and decide which scent to use or create my own with a mix of several. They're waterless so you're only getting scents here and this cute little box is reusable. It'd be perfect for holding mints, jewelry when you're out and need to do something and don't want to get your rings dirty or many other uses. Right now my favorite is Taunt but I honestly love every single scent in this set. I'm so happy I was able to grab this and try it because now I'm in love with Dedcool.

reviews.review_title: DedCool Discovery Set Is A Scent Laboratory!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hello my name is Michele and Iu2019m a Beauty Expert in my 30u2019s who is obsessed with fragrance and trying new fragrances. Iu2019ve had the pleasure of trying full sizes of both the Dedcool Xtra Milk and Dedcool Sunlit Blooms fragrances. Sunlit Blooms is my absolute favorite scent. Itu2019s like a sunlit frolic through an orange tree field in the summer. It already has vanilla in it which is delightful. Xtra Milk has a clean fresh clean linen scent with a hint of cedar. The Dedcool Discovery Set is the perfect way for me to add to my scent wardrobe and to make endless scent possibilities. Itu2019s like your own scent laboratory.  Vanilla is one of my favorite scents, so naturally I had to add some vanilla to the mix. Vanilla pairs beautifully with Fragrance 03 u201cBlondeu201d. I have found my favorite new scent with that beautiful mix.  Milk began it all. It is a lighter version of Xtra Milk so it isnu2019t as strong and its like a whisper of a scent that layers well and will compliment each scent. Taunt is so spicy and sexy! I really can smell the Amber and Vanilla. Itu2019s perfect for date night. Red Dakota has a strong citrus lemon-orange combination. Itu2019s definitely not my favorite scent. Itu2019s a bit strong for me. Milk and Sunlit Blooms pair beautifully to create a nice sweet orange scent. I would suggest this discovery set by Dedcool to anyone new to fragrances so they can experiment and find out what scents work well with their skin chemistry. I also would suggest this to anyone else who loves to mix scents and make their own scents.

reviews.review_title: Great set to discover new scents!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This Dedcool discovery set is great to discover and choose which dedcool scent is perfect and suit you .. It comes with 6 u00d7 1.5 ml sampler scents spray in a cool looking tin can. I'm happy to be able to smell all these. One of my favorite is the ''Sunlit Blooms'', it smells beautiful and young. It's a little sweet and flowery, orangey with the hint of vanilla. The scent is kinda soft, not intense and strong so this is great for people with sensitive nose. And it last all day. I also like the Blonde it's a bit spicy, a little woody and citrusy is like intoxicating, strong independent and daring. The Taunt has a beautiful soft, powdery and vanilla scent. I think the smell is kinda addicting.. Red Dakota  is like citrusy, fresh and flowery.. It smells beautiful, it's like the more you smell it the more you will like it. I actually love all these scents and last all day. Now on my wishlist, I want to get the full size.. The Milk and Xtra Milk are also included in this set, notes of amber, bergamot and white musk. I just can't explain how they smells like coz I can't really smell them, the scents are too light and weak for my nose to smell them..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm going to start off by saying, Get It!! I am a fragrance girly through and through, I wear scents based on occasion and mood so trust me when I say I have tried many and Dedcool as a brand surpasses all my expectations. You are certain to fall in love with at least one scent, but if you're like me you'll love them all. My favorite of the set is Sunlit Blooms and layering that with Xtra Milk just takes it above and beyond and feels like a scent that is just truly me. The longevity is incredible, it's the type of formula that lingers on your clothes and sheets for days. I also like to spritz on my hair and I will also catch the scent randomly throughout the day. It's just clean, fresh, I love the simplicity of the bottle as well as the story behind the brand. Step outside your comfort zone and give this discovery set a try!

reviews.review_title: Favorites: Taunt, Xtra Milk, Red Dakota
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first experience with DedCool and I'm obsessed. The sample set includes six unique scents that are all vegan, cruelty-free, and carbon neutral which I really appreciate as a consumer that wants brands to make environmentally friendly products. The first two scents are their best sellers, Milk and Xtra Milk, which smell very light, clean, and warm with top notes of bergamot, white musk, and amber. Itu2019s a layering scent so Iu2019ve topped it with others from the sample set and it added a layer of complexity to my skin. My husband is super picky with fragrances, but he smelled this on me and said it was by far his favorite. It's a very clean, warm, and neutral scent - think linens, fresh days, clean sheets and skin, but better. My personal favorite out of the whole lineup is Taunt which has bergamot, amber, and vanilla. Taunt is what I would consider my new signature scent - warm, super clean, sweet but not sugary. It dried down the best in my opinion and mixed the best with my personal skin chemistry. If you love vanilla scents, Taunt will be your new favorite. Red Dakota initially smelled a little too intense for me, but it was significantly better after it dried down and let off more of the gardenia scent. Blonde initially smelled a little on the weaker side for me, but similarly, after it dried down it projected much better and gave off those floral violet and saffron notes. Sunlit blooms smells exactly as you'd expect - sunshine in a bottle! Give it some time to dry down before smelling it because the orange blossom is intense initially, but if you love citrusy scents that feel like a summer's day, this is for you. All in all, this sample set is elite in terms of environmentally friendly scents that check off your moral boxes as well as checking off your self-care scents boxes. I sometimes experience allergies to fragrances, but none of the perfumes in the set gave me issues. My overall best pick is Taunt, but you can't go wrong with any of them!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am super passionate about fragrance and love trying as many scents as I can, so Dedcool's discovery set was a perfect addition to my collection. Scent layering is gaining more discussion in the fragrance world and I love the idea of creating scents with the purpose to be great for layering and great on their own. I LOVE the tin this set comes in, the design is so cool. I also love the idea of the samples arrive in something I can reuse. It is perfect for packing my little samples when I'm traveling and I have already used it for that! Dedcool makes some beautiful scents, my two favorites are Taunt & Sunlit Blooms in this collection. Milk & Xtra Milk are classic skin scents which are beautiful. I was not a big fan of Blonde & Red Dakota reminded me of a gummy candy I bought at Ikea. Overall I do love Dedcool's products and this set.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the DedCool Discovery Set and hereu2019s my experience and opinions on it.  I liked that it was presented in a tin and itu2019s nice to try the best sellers from dedcool and knowing which scents work for me.  I liked that this brand because their fragrance is nontoxic and also has clean ingredients.  My favorite fragrance is u201ctauntu201d for the vanilla and musk scent. It is a very comforting and also fresh scent for me.  I think this tin sampler is great for travel and I can bring these on the road.  itu2019s also nice to mix and match the fragrances together to create a personal scent.  I also find this sampler set is great for making choices on what to buy and which scent work for me.  Overall the scent are complex and really unique and Iu2019m really happy to try out more scent from Dedcool

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The DedCool Eau de Parfum Discovery Set includes six sample-sized spray vials that make it easy to try multiple of DedCoolu2019s best-selling fragrances, whether youu2019re on the hunt for your number one u201csignature scentu201d, or if you just enjoy switching up your scent each day.   From this set, Iu2019ve found Taunt and Blonde to be my favorites - I interpret both as warmer, cozier scents that are gentle but still unique enough to be complimented and are truly genderless. I have a full-size bottle of Sunlit Blooms as well that I enjoy wearing year-round but especially love reaching for in the Spring. While all of the fragrances in this Discovery Set are noticeable for 8+ hours on their own, layering them over Milk or Xtra Milk (which are both also included in the set!) makes them last even longer and project even farther.   While not every scent in this set was my favorite, it has definitely helped me form a highly positive impression of the DedCool brand as a whole and I canu2019t wait to try some more of their fragrances - I highly recommend them!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a beauty enthusiasts who loves to experience with new fragrances. I believe I found my new favorite perfume.   I can be sensitive to fragrances. It can cause  headaches and nausea. I have yet experienced symptoms.   I wear this perfume nearly everyday. As you can see I running low. I'm reserving the I can.   It doesn't matter where I go for the day I will wear at least one of the fragrances. I normally with layer with the extra milk for a sweeter fruitful smell. I will layer to gain a new smell. So far it's working well.   Date nights I layer the fragnances which result my boyfriend invading more of my personal space. ud83dude09  This week I was at the gym. I decided to wear extra milk, one pump applied. I excerised enough for a glow rather excessively sweating. My scent stayed consistent.   I am very satisfied with this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Say hello to the cutest little perfume sample set! Six fabulous dedcool scents, so you can find your favorite one! I especially love that you can sample their newest scent, Sunlit Blooms. These little testers last for about half a dozen wears for me, so they are the perfect size.

reviews.review_title: A Little Pricey But a Good u201cTry Meu201d Set
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As a fragrance lover and professional beauty writer, I have a penchant for discovery sets. Iu2019m rarely one to try a fragrance because itu2019s popular, but I do enjoy experiencing a brand from all different angles via small vials. The DedCool Discovery Set includes multiple fragrances with my favorite notes u2013 amber and vanilla u2013 so I enjoyed testing the collection as a whole.   Fragrance 01 Taunt was a given for me since it has a strong gourmand vibe to it, but Fragrance 03 Blonde shocked me to no end. Woods rank high on my list, and the black violet brightens Blonde above its juniper tones, giving it a bit of purple fruitiness.   Red Dakota is a beautiful late spring, early summer scent with the bergamot elevating the gardenia with a juicy citrus note to avoid the typical cloying white flower feel.   Sadly, Milk and XTRA Milk are lost on my olfactory system. I canu2019t detect much of a scent in either one, but I do think the Discovery Set is worth buying, especially if youu2019re unable to try these scents in person. For me to find four fragrances out of six that I would be willing to purchase makes this a complete success to me.   Definitely worth testing. You might even be surprised by what you enjoy the most.

reviews.review_title: The best discovery set perfume I tried.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First of I love the packaging and doesn't look cheap and it is  pretty descent in my opinion.  I love all the cute sample sizes perfumes in this discovery set from Dedcool.  This really a good way to discover perfumes without  wasting a lot of money by buying a lot and expensive perfumes that will end you're not liking the scent   By trying this set now I know what to buy from Dedcool perfumes collections  without spending a  lot of money.  I love the brands overall concept and the ingredients and manufacturing the products.  Very high quality I could tell it.  I am planning to gift my hubby with set so that I'll know what he wants and I'll buy him and gift it to him.  As well will do the same to my friends and colleagues.  Lastly the perfumes last very long and the scents are amazing and not overpowering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What's not to love about DedCool fragrances? This discovery set is everything! The fragrances are all so versatile and beautiful! My favorite is, hands down, Xtra Milk. What a powerful and beautiful fragrance! I also played around with layering them and that was a fun ride. I custom blended Sunlit Blooms and Milk and that was a super cool experiment. It worked nicely with my skin and the dry down was wonderful. I can't get enough of Blonde and Red Dakota. Taunt is fabulous, as well! I love the packaging, brand name and typeface. Such a bonus that the fragrances are unisex, genderless, vegan and cruelty-free. I have also used them as a home spray, very sparingly, of course, but just enough to get some of that gorgeousness into parts of my apartment. Even though these are genderless, they tend to over index on more traditional masculine notes (except for Sunlit Blooms), but still work well for what we associate with feminine scents, too. DedCool is truly next level.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The DedCool Discovery Set is a must-have for anyone who loves exploring unique and captivating fragrances. Each scent in the set offers a distinct and memorable olfactory experience, from fresh and floral notes to deep and sensual undertones. What sets DedCool apart is its commitment to sustainability and clean ingredients, making it a guilt-free indulgence. The Discovery Set allows you to experiment with different scents before committing to a full-size bottle, which is perfect for finding your signature scent or mixing and matching according to your mood. Overall, I highly recommend the DedCool Discovery Set for anyone looking to elevate their fragrance game with eco-conscious, high-quality perfumes. I definitely recommend it last all day long.

reviews.review_title: Perfect set to pack when traveling!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The DedCool Discovery Set is the perfect little set to pack when traveling! I love the neat locking tin that it comes in so that nothing spills out into your luggage and all of the scents stay neatly organized. I love to travel but hate bringing a whole bottle of perfume with me. Iu2019m always at the weight limit for my suitcase and this has helped me to be able to pack it all when it comes to perfume. It is also an amazing way for me to decide which scent I would like a big bottle of next. I will warn that you only need one spray for the whole day with these scents. They are very concentrated and really last. With other perfumes, I have always had to use multiple sprays so I really feel like I am getting more bang for my buck with DedCool. I would highly recommended the DedCool Discovery Set for anyone looking to try a variety of prestigious scents or looking for the perfect scents to travel with.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: As a perfume addict I love discovery sets because you get to experiment and find your signature scent before committing to a big bottle. The set comes in 6 scents along with a cute reusable case with a secure lock so you can carry it around with you. This set is also amazing to travel with because itu2019s perfect size to fit  anywhere including document pouch. The set has below scents included.  -Sunlit Blooms It smells floral with strong key notes of orange blossom and a hint of floral. This can be my spring fragrance when I love floral scents. -Milk When you first spray it smells nothing but you need to let it sit and you will be mesmerized by the amazing scent. I will probably use it as a layering scent. it smells very clean and fresh and delicious on me.  This is the scent you want to wear if you want the u201cyou smell good complimentsu201d.  -Taunt Itu2019s definitely a delicious vanilla scent. I love vanilla scents. This is a really pleasant vanilla scent and definitely can be my fall scent. Although I wouldnu2019t mind using is daily because itu2019s not a strong vanilla. It can also be a special occasion fragrance smells heavenly.  -Red Dakota This smells like strong Bergamot on me. Almost like a very strong citrus like scent. Out of the 6 this comes 2nd last for me because I am not a fan of strong citrusy scents. I donu2019t smell the other notes on me.  -Blonde This one smells strong & spicy almost tobacco when you first spray it but then you can smell the black violet. It smells very strong on me so I would probably skip this one if you are not into strong scents.  -Xtra milk  This is same as milk fragrance on me. I will be using this as layering with scents. It smells very nostalgic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The DedCool Discovery Set is such an amazing collection for me to try every interesting scent they have and prioritize which one I should be getting first. The problem is, I LOVE everything that is in it right now that I cant wait to get my hands on every single bottle. What I love about Dedcool's fragrances is they are unique and beautiful scent as they are but I can enjoy being adventurous by layering them. I can't even pick a single one as my favorite since all of them matches my body chemistry and just smells so heavenly.  The Tin pack is very sturdy, compact has a lock that goes in any purse so I carry my scent anywhere I go and use (or layer) them as I please.  The samples I got were as follows:  Fragrance 01 - Taunt (Notes: Bergamot, Vanilla & Amber)  Fragrance 03 - Blonde (Notes: Black Violet & Saffron)  Red Dakota (Notes: Gardenia, Amber & Bergamot)  Sunlit Blooms (Notes: Orange Blossom, White Floral & Salty Vanilla)  Milk Layering Fragrance (Notes: Amber, Bergamot & White Musk)  Xtra Milk (Notes: Amber, Bergamot & White Musk)  Amazing collection and I look forward to getting the actual size bottles of these fragrances. I wish the actual bottles were refillable too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this Dedcool sample set with aluminum case honestly. Itu2019s a cool looking hard case (which gives good protection from breaking sample vials) but also on-the go and travel friendly. The aluminum case itself can be reusable with any desired purposes. Dedcool in general has quite bad longevity honestly. Itu2019s great for layering instead. Moreover, itu2019s a great way to explore multiple scents to able to find personal favorite one (favorite combinations) before purchasing a full-size bottle. With my sample set, I got: Milk, Xtra Milk, Red Dakota, Blonde, Taunt and Sunlit Bloom. The one which stands out the most to me is Sunlit Bloom. Sunlit Bloom is a bit floral but so fresh with a hint of sweetness. It likes a citrusy sweet, fresh scent just like an amazing summer morning. Surprisingly, it had the longest longevity on me compared to otheru2019s scent in the set (around 5-6hrs). The creamy soft musky scent like Milk or sharper, cozy musky scent like Xtra Milk can create a good combo with Sunlit Bloom - give the combo a good depth of the smoky musky layer. Or, Blonde and Taunt is another favorite combination of mine also: woody, spicy scent of Blonde pairs well with the fresh floral with a hint of vanilla in Taunt. I also like the Zesty freshness with the strong floral base power from Gardenia note of Red Dakota is a great option to pair with either Xtra Milk or Blonde. The sample set offers unlimited possibilities and can be used for layering scents or any desired purpose. No limited, just creative.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If youu2019re a fragrance lover and would like to experience this brand for the first time, this discovery pack is a great place to start. Thereu2019s a nice range of notes from warm and cozy with hints of amber to light and floral with hints of orange blossom which makes it easy to play with various combinations. However, one of my favorite standalone scents in this pack is Fragrance 01 u201cTauntu201d. The combination of amber, vanilla, and bergamot evokes a pleasant and deeply euphoric experience for me. Itu2019s rich but not overpowering and settles into subtlety that lingers around. This one deserves a full size purchase. One final thought that almost feels silly to mention is the packaging. I had a bit of trouble figuring out  the top and how to open it, only to find the vague instructions in small print along the side.  The sliding mechanism just seemed to cause more trouble than necessary. Other than that, this set is great way to experience this new fragrance line without committing to a full size bottle immediately.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Here's my review of the DedCool discovery kit. Inside you'll find six fragrances that are so lovely and soft. The first being fragrance 01 as known as taunt its a vanilla with amber and bergamot perfume its so pleasant and smells divine and lingers all day. The second would be fragrance 03 as known as blonde with black violet and saffron completely breathe taking and stays on all day with no replying needed. The third is red Dakota a gardenia amber and bergamot it smells like a light floral day in a garden. Guaranteed to bring you compliments. Next would be sunlit blooms packed with notes of orange blossom and white floral and salty vanilla. It makes you smell like a nice spring day floating in a flower patch. The last two scents are the Xtra milk layering fragrance and the xtra milk which is amber, bergamot, and white musk. When using the layering perfume it helps to keep the potency of the scent all day. Recommended to all my friends and family.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed testing out this DedCool discovery set of perfumes. As travel agent, this set is perfect for travel and fits well in my purse. I liked some scents more than others but my favorite was the Red Dakota that was definitely my daily go to for me when going to the gym. I got many compliments by both men and women at the gym! Something I do love about DedCool is that the scent is long lasting. Itu2019s honestly incredible how long the scent stays even after my work out, Pilates, or roller blading. This product being  waterless base  allows the product to actually stay and not fade. I would recommend this brand over all but just say to be careful if youu2019re too sensitive to smells because it can get overwhelming. I layered the Madonna with a Dior fragrance I had a created a nighttime fragrance. Mixing and matching was like being my own scientist making my own fragrance line!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have enjoyed using the Dedpool Discovery Set fragrances. I am a big lover of colognes and fragrances. I am 33 years old and I have been wearing fragrances for a long time now. So, I have come to learn a lot about what I like and donu2019t like. I liked everything about this Dedpool Discovery Set! First of all, I love that all of the included fragrances were parfums. Parfums contain a higher concentration of oil, which means they last so much longer. The Taunt fragrance has a great flowery and woody smell. It would be a great summer and early fall scent. The Blonde fragrance smells very beachy and airy. It instantly transports me to the beach or a warm summer day. Red Dakota fragrance has a spicy, sweet, and flowery smell. It had a great spring vibe to it. The Sunlit Blooms fragrance has a great flowery and salty scent. It reminds me of walking through a flower patch on a summer day. The Milk fragrance has a very soft, sweet smell. I have been wearing this particular fragrance to bed. The Milk fragrance smells great and is soft enough to not overwhelm my senses at bedtime. The Xtra Milk fragrance is my favorite. I love its creamy, sweet, and rich smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
