reviews.review_text: Iu2019m a serious fragrance lover and to be honest I loved this variety of mini scents. Starting with the packaging it was really cute. The case protects all of the sample perfumes. I love the squeeze feature of the case as well. It can be a little tricky opening at times for me though. But as a safety feature it was pretty smart to add. The minis give you a chance to smell them all and my are they all different. I loved 3 out of the 6 fragrances that were inside. Red Dakota and Extra Milk were my least favorite, it was a little too strong for me. My top two favorites were fragrance 03 blonde and sunlit blooms. They are both more so on the powdery light side. Overall, I would give this fragrance box a 4/5. The line is great and most of the scents are amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am such a scent addict that I absolutely love having travel size scents to always take with me on the go. I think this was such a wonderful introduction into the different DedCool scents and really being able to customize and pick out what scents suit you the best. In my honest opinion, DedCool makes some of the most unique scent combinations I think I have ever experienced throughout my years of trying so many perfumes. All of the scents in the pack have their own unique beauty. I can definitely see how you can later multiple scents to create one customized scent. The best way I found to mix different scents, is by putting a spritz, of whichever combination I want to try try, on different zones that I usually apply perfume. The main points I would use is behind my ear, on the decolletage, on both sides of wrists, a shot down my shirt, and I don't even mind adding a little to clothing. Overall, it's hard to rank the scents because each one has their own unique beauty. The only downside to this pack is that there is Milk and Xtra Milk, they smell way too similar for it to make sense that they both in the pack. The both are good base layers to build up the scent. I liked the scent which is Unique and cruelty free and i like the fragnance which contains notes of musk, Oak and some scents are very light.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have worked in the beauty industry for over 5 years and while fragrance was never my expertise, I have always had an appreciation for it.   This discovery set from Dedcool is absolutely amazing. It has all you could ever ask for, something sweet, something musky and everything in between. I love how these scents layer well together or stand out even on their own. I don't think I have found my favorite combo yet with layering but there are so many possibilities. Some of my favorite scents from this set are Sunlit blooms which I have previously tried, fragrance 01 Taunt which is slowly climbing the ladder to be my favorite Dedcool scent, and Red Dakota because it smells like a floral fragrances more complex older sibling.   I really enjoy how thought was even put into the packaging to make this childproof by requiring you to squeeze the sides in order to open it. It is a little thing I would have over looked since I do not have kids

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Get ready to jet set with the absolute perfect Discovery Set from Dedcool!! Be travel ready and easily take your scent from day to night or on the go with u201cTAUNTu201d, RED DAKOTA, or u201cBLONDEu201d!! Layer it with MILK for a bolder and stronger scent or just spray a few extra sprits and smell like a sexy and sophisticated vixen. Amber and Bergamont are the stars of the show with these fragrances making them the perfect travel companion! SUNLIT BLOOMS is the best for the daytime with notes of Orange Blossom, White Floral, and Salty Vanilla. Pair it with a little yellow sundress and youu2019re ready for some fun days in the sun! I love that all these scents are unique and long lasting. Iu2019m also obsessed that the packaging is just the perfect size to fit in your make up bag, purse or luggage!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you tested and tried the DedCool fragrance and you can't decide on one to take home with you, this is a nice collection to get instead.  All the scents in this miniature collection smell absolutely amazing.    I am very sensitive to scents.  If my senses cannot tolerate something, I will not like it.  I am so impressed that each and every one of these scents were enjoyable and pleasant.  They pass my picky and sensitive nose.  Each miniature bottle gives me a generous amount to try and wear for a period of time.  It gives me a good option to test it out before committing to a full size.  It is so handy to place in my handbag and use on the go.  My favorite so far is Sunlit Blooms.  If you like floral and sweetness like me, this is your best friend.  I think if these pleased my sensitive nose, I am sure these will win a lot more people.  The formulation and balance of the fragrance are so well put together.  If you are interested in having a nice collection of fragrances or curious about this brand, after my experience, you'll definitely love this set because this amazingly won my sensitive nose over.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was blown away by the variety and quality of scents in the dedcool discovery set. From fresh and floral to deep and musky, there's something for every mood and occasion. All of these fragrances smell amazing. My top 3 favorites would be Blonde, sunlit blooms and Xtra Milk. Blonde offers a fresh and uplifting scent, Sunlit Blooms provides a floral and vibrant fragrance, and Xtra Milk gives off a cozy and comforting aroma. Casing has sleek font design, itu2019s cute, easy and durable. I would bring this with me on a vacation or any trip out of town. The discovery set is a great way to experience a variety of their popular fragrances. All of the scents are unique and long-lasting, making them perfect for everyday wear. The Dedcool discovery set is a great value and a must have for any fragrance lover.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Discovery? Of DedCool? Yes please!! To start my love for DedCool knows no limits and yes I had only tried Sunlit Blooms prior to the discovery set! Luckily there is a little baby Sunlit B for my to go needs. After falling in love with Sunlit Blooms I was thrilled to try more DedCool fragrance and I was not disappointed. Firstly I love the little case the set arrives in and am already thinking of ways to reuse it after Iu2019m done discovering. Now to the good stuff, Xtra Milk? Oh you mean the fragrance Iu2019m cheating on Sunlit Blooms with? Yes thatu2019s the one! Wait you mean thee Blonde?? My side piece? Hold on now I have made too many discoveries. I can truly transform into someone new everyday every hour. Oh and they all play well together so talk about scentmaxing

reviews.review_title: Discovering the Essence of Pure Luxury.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Over the years, I have enjoyed discovering various fragrances across several brands, from high-end to low-end. Yet, Dedcool has become one of my top favorites in my collection. However, the other scents in this tin have piqued my interest in getting full-size bottles! This set includes alluring scents: Fragrance 01 u201cTaught,u201d Fragrance 03 u201cBlonde,u201d Red Dakota, Milk, Xtra Milk, and Sunlit Blooms. This is a great set to have the opportunity to discover other scents, to layer, and to see which ones work on my body chemistry.  Now that I have tried all six, my top faves are Sunlit Blooms and Xtra Milk, but I have fondly become infatuated with Red Dakota and u201cTaught.u201d These two scents are mysterious, rich, and exquisite. These two scents have the earthy tones of amber and bergamot mixed with a floral and sweet twist. It draws out the sensual significance of my personality. I like to layer the u201cTaughtu201d with a splash of u201cBlondeu201d and Red Dakota with a splash of Sunlit Blooms. Creating my signature scent effortlessly with this set is exciting and fun. From citrus to smokey, sweet, and earthy, it carries a fantastic range of scents for any occasion. Therefore, there is a scent to evoke a range of memories, emotions, and unique stories.  Furthermore, the set comes in a slide-open tin that is small enough to put in my handbag and travel. No worries about leaks or spills, and I have a lovely variety for simply elevating my fragrance palette to new heights. I recommend this product for avid enthusiasts of fragrance seeking an upgraded scent or wanting to find something newu2026this is the perfect set. The smell is genderless and vegan (bonus), and it comes in a chic tin that is reusable (Great to put cotton swabs, bobby pins, earrings, travel eyeshadow applicators, etc.), to name a few ways to use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Ok ! I have tested out all the dedcool scents from this little travel kit and I have my opinion ready!  First thing is the little tin it comes in is quite different! Iu2019m happy that I will be able to keep it and use it for other things .  It took me a minute to figure out how to open the tin .  You have to squeeze the sides and slide the top .  My favorite scent in this pack is definitely taunt .  To me taunt is a better version of the milk and extra milk .  Itu2019s also a skin scent that is very neutral, smells like iso super e and amber , smells like freshly clean warmed skin .  I actually adore the taunt one . I used up the whole sample in a day . Milk and extra milk are not for me because they are both far too weak , also clean skin , barely there scents .I canu2019t really smell them and I want to be able to smell the smell myself because I wear the perfume for me. .   I do not like red Dakota at all .  I donu2019t know how to describe that one but itu2019s actually a scrubber for me .  Very strong in comparison to the others , sharp ,  green ,  reminds me of some sort of floral I donu2019t like but very very green , like quashed dandelions .   I really enjoyed blonde !  It smells very different.  Really reminds me of this teen spirit deodorant with a hot pink cap I used to wear when I was younger .  I thought maybe peony or orchid , it smells like purple or pink flowers, itu2019s not too sweet ,  very feminine but there is a little bit of a sharper green note . And finally sunlit blooms !  That one is interesting!  Very different from other scents .  I canu2019t decide if I love it or hate it .  I like it for the most part but there is something there I donu2019t enjoy , I think maybe the salty vanilla is what draws me in .it almost reminds me of lime , and bubblegum  maybe hubba bibs and juicy fruit ? . Itu2019s interesting .  So out of all of them .  Taunt , blonde, milk, extra milk, sunlit blooms , are the ones I like in order and red Dakota is my dislike. .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a freelance makeup artist for over 10 years and a person who has been obsessing about makeup and perfume. I canu2019t go out without putting perfume. I love DedCool discovery set. Dedcool has a great collection of amazing unisex perfume. In this discovery set, it contains their six best selling scents. It includes Talint, Blonde, Red Dekota, Sunlit Blooms, Milk and Xtra milk. I would use three words to summarise their Perfume : clean, skin like and cozy. I enjoy all of their perfumes. Of which, Sunlit blooms and Xtra milk are my favourites. With this discovery set, you can try all of their best selling perfumes and you can also try layering different perfumes to create your own signature scents. All the scents are soft and skin like. It becomes your own scent after applying. It is light, elegant not overpowering. I feel very comfortable wearing Dedcool perfume. They are subtle but addictive. I kept sneezing my wrist. And I also like to spray it on my sweaters. I feel so cozy and warm. Try them now and pick your own favourite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I noticed this cute little sample set when shopping for a new perfume. Although I was drawn to its esthetic, I decided to leave it behind. Instead, I got a full size of their Sunlit Blooms, which I absolutely love! However, I never seemed to stop thinking about the sample set. After a few days, I gave in, went back and got it and Iu2019m so glad I did!  First off the packaging was super unique. I love the gliding top so it can close tightly and stay secured. Once you open the box youu2019ll find 6 little bottles. This is a great and cost effective way to test out other of their offerings before investing into the retail size.   So far I havenu2019t been disappointed. I absolutely fell in love with the variety and different moods this discovery set offers. So much so, that I canu2019t even pick a favorite. Theyu2019re all give such different, clean, serene, romantic, and soft yet powerful vibes. As you guessed it, those are my go to phrases when it comes to my own preferred notes. Needless to say, I think Dedcool fragrances  are right up my alley!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: DedCool Discovery Set has so many excellent scents that it is impossible to choose a favorite. This Discovery Set comes with six travel sized unique scents for every occasion. I have used every scent in this collection for a different occasion. They are all unisex, but their aromas change with each individual that uses them. I love that. No two people wear Dedcool the same and that makes them expressly unique. I am a salon owner and a professional hairdresser of over twenty years. I am all about beauty in every form. Dedcool is the future of perfume and I highly recommend them to everyone! My personal favorite of the collection is the Sunlit Bloom but my mother preferred the Fragrance #1 (Taunt) best with her skin chemistry. My son preferred the Xtra Milk. How many perfumes can boast love from so many ages and genders? I adore them and carry their products in my salon. If you haven't tried this sampler, then you're really missing out!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am pleasantly surprised on how much I love this brand because I wasn't sure what to expect from a gender less perfume but l am a big fan of this perfume now. These scents are smooth on the senses and do not sting or over power like a lot of other perfumes. I love that you can sample a bunch of different scents from this company all in this convenient cute little tin. I really like how you can layer these scents with other scents available by this same brand.These scents do an excellent job of making it feminine and masculine at the same time. I like how long the scent lasts which I would say is a few hours. Perfumes that last longer than a few hours tend to give me a headache. My personal favorite scent in this little sample pack is the sunlit blooms. This is my first time trying this brand and I will definitely be purchasing more in the future.

reviews.review_title: Fun way to discover new perfumes!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am an Eau de perfumes lovers. I like discovering  new brands and perfumes  whether  it is a high  end or not. I really love sample size perfumes. I like all the perfumes in this discovery  set from decool but my favorite  of all is the Red Dakota . I feel in love with it and now I decided  to buy the full size.   I love the fact that this sample size perfumes  are travel friendly  and you can gift it to someone  as a gift in that way they can try and find their perfect  perfumes.  in that way they can try and find their perfect perfumes.   I love the longevity of each perfumes.   It last very long and not overpowering.   The ingredients are really nice too.  It's not irritating my skin and these perfumes are great for layering

reviews.review_title: a must have in every fragrance collection
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is probably one of my favorite fragrance discovery sets. The difference groups of fragrances not only work beautifully on their own but can be combined! Iu2019ve never used a brand of fragrance that can be paired so easily to create your own unique scent. I think especially cool because anyone can use them and create their own person fragrance experience. The little vials themselves are great quality as well as the tin they come in. The tin can be reused after the vials are gone. Dedcool is such a cool brand and has created innovated fragrance mixtures are that are clean and chemical free. As someone who has worked with fragrances I absolutely love the u201cnewnessu201d behind the brand

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a huge fragrance collector and have become a really big fan of the Dedcool brand, this was my second opportunity to try the brand and I was lucky enough to attend a masterclass with the founder of Dedcool and found it to be such an amazing story and was thoroughly impressed with the brands core values and beliefs. The xtra milk scent is absolutely my favorite scent, even by itself as I'm a sucker for white Musk especially! But I find it to be a perfect base scent to layer others atop it. The only thing I would change about the discovery set would be that they switch out the at least the milk fragrance and possibly the extra milk, make it where it contains 6 of the other fragrances because I think most people would purchase the milk or extra milk separately and I would have like the opportunity to try two other scents in place of those. But this set is great for anyone who doesn't own any of the full size bottles of dedcool to begin with and it gives a great mix of scents to sample before purchasing any. There isn't a single scent in it that isn't lovely, anyone can wear these and mix them up, personalize them... You won't be disappointed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this set includes best sellers as well as other scents and I think it is definitely worth buying to find out what you like because of course it depends per person what works for you!  My all time favorite scent was Red Dakota, the floral and sweet notes of Gardenia were very present and the scent was very feminine.  My second favorite was 03 u201cBlondeu201d it is unique and has its own charm in comparison to the rest of the scents.  01 Taunt was a good middle ground for me I think sampling this scent was the best way for me to get a feel for the product as the description can only help so much, I wouldnu2019t be as compelled to buy from the written notes as i am from actually trying this.  Milk and Xtra Milk are the last two included in this set and I will definitely be using those two the most, theyu2019re the cleanest scents of the pack and definitely compliment each other.  I think this entire set is worth is getting because of all the different layering combinations as well as being able to try out all these unique scents!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you're a scent enthusiast, the DedCool Discovery Set is a must-have that contains Fragrance 01 Taunt, Fragrance 03 Blonde, Red Dakota, Sunlit Blooms, Milk, and Xtra Milk. My personal favorites are the 01 Taunt Eau de Parfum and the 03 Blonde Eau de Parfum. Taunt and 03 Blonde from DedCool's set are my ride-or-die scents. Not only do they last longer than my last relationship, but the functional purpose of these eau de parfums is like a mood-enhancing magic wand. From long college lectures to office work to brunch dates, I've never felt more confident and alluring. Taunt is for the bold and empowered, while Blonde is a warm companion for those seeking comfort. The entire set caters to diverse tastes, making it perfect for anyone wanting to explore and embrace their olfactory preferences. DedCool has truly curated a collection for every nose out there! This set is more than just perfumes; it's an olfactory adventure, a sensory journey that adds a touch of elegance to your everyday life. DedCool, you've won my heart (and nose) with this masterpiece!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: DeDCool as a brand is one that is completely innovative in a world that continues to follow patterns. Other perfume companies tend to stick with what they think works but refuse to take a chance on a product that may not be in the norm. DeDCool has burst through those boundaries and created a mixture of scents that have a little something for each and every individual. For myself, Xtra Milk is my favorite and works very well with my body chemistry, but for someone else, they have 5 other choices of scents to find the one that works best for them. The packaging was adorable and came in a small tin case, housing each scent safely. On the back side of the tin case, descriptions of each scent are placed, with each ingredient being noted. The simplicity of the design is one that immediately got my attention as I opened the box and I am now a true DeDCool fan!

reviews.review_title: Great for creating the perfect scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the tin and how it is sleek and compact. You can literally take this anywhere. The tin did not open easily, which is good because that means the scents wouldnu2019t fly everywhere.  Red Dakota and xtra milk has been my favorite combo! I get lots of compliments on my scent! And if I feel that I need to refresh the scent i just Take the tin out and reapply. How perfect! Taunt and sunlit blooms was another favorite combo. I love how itu2019s endless and i can create the scent I want.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have mixed feelings on some of the fragrances. The pros are the sizes of the spray bottles are definitely worth the price you are paying, the fragrances layer very nice together, and the tin that the fragrances come in is reuseable. The cons are certain fragrances in the set do not seem to last as long on the skin unless layered with either Milk or Xtra Milk as a base. I do not mind layering fragrances; however, I should not need to layer the fragrances for them to last longer on the skin. I would only say that the layering is needed for two out of the six scents, Taunt and Blonde. those are also the two lightest scents in the tin. They smelly lovely on their own I just wish they would last longer throughout the day without layering. Overall, I think this set as a whole is a great option if you are wanting to try out some of the Dedcool fragrances first before settling on just one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My background is retail & phytomedicine. My experience is, I am a beauty enthusiast and skincare junkie looking for my holy grail of products. I am in absolute love with DedCoolu2019s discovery set of fragrances and hereu2019s why, this discovery set has everything you need to find your new signature scent. There are 6 scents to choose from they come packaged in a unique reusable tin that is totally retro and clever. The range in scents are from floral to warm & spicy and everything in between.  I personally like each scent but, my standout favorites are the Milk, Xtra Milk, Taunt, Red Dakota & Blonde. I especially love the description of Blonde; Magnetic, Narcotic, Dewy & Darku2026umm yes, please. Each of these fragrances are perfect as a stand alone but are meant for layering and finding yourself in these unique scents. What impresses me most about this set is that these are buildable scents  that are unique to you and therefore is a signature scent because our body chemistry is different so, when this heats up with your body temperature you are not going to smell like anyone else..like the creator says u201cit smells like you, but betteru201d and If youu2019re not familiar with DedCool and its founder/creator Carina Chaz then youu2019re missing out  Carina has created these fragrances as a genderless, all-inclusive brand that should be on your radar, these are made with plant extracts and anti-inflammatory carrier extracts that are perfect for anyone who struggles with allergies, sensitivity or are allergic to synthetic chemicals or donu2019t want water or alcohol in their fragrances, or better yetu2026 donu2019t want to smell like everyone else..This discovery set is perfect for finding and creating your signature scent and I absolutely recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This sample kit is perfect for finding your next favorite fragrance.  Use them as is, or you can mixed up to create something new!  I also love the reusable tin they come in. There are 6 scents in this product.  And each are unique in their own way. Taunt is the perfect vanilla scent.  Vanilla is a bottom in the formula.  But, it stands out to me in the most beautiful way. Light floral aroma with Bergamot.  Not overpowering and it very soft on the senses. Blonde is an amazing floral scent.  Sweet and spicy.  Itu2019s hard for me to pinpoint a certain element.  Making this the perfect head turning fragrance.  The one that makes people stop to find out what it is. Sunlight Blooms remind me of a warm sunny spring day. Beautiful citrus tones with soft floral and salty vanilla. Milk and Xtra Milk are your go to bergamot.  Subtle with Milk and bold with Xtra Milk.  The perfect layering clean musk.  Or wear on its own and fully embrace the warm amber and bergamot. Red Dakota, I was not prepared for this one.  Following such soft floral notes of the previous scents.  Red Dakota is zesty and bold.  Clementine with woodsy and amber notes and a splash of berries.  If you need a little boost to spark up your power, this is absolutely the one! A perfect u201chere I am, see me!u201d scent that demands anyone around to pay attention, in the best way

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As a licensed Cosmetologist, working in the beauty industry for 28 years, I have been introduced to and sampled many yummy fragrances! I am especially attracted to the brand DedCool because it is a vegan and genderless brand that can be worn by anyone for any occasion. I also love that the scents are meant to be layered, so you can create your own signature scent!  The DedCool Discovery Set is an amazing gift for ANYONE or yourself! It is a cute tin with a lid that houses 6 sprayable vials of 6 different fragrances from Dedcool. The vials are each 0.5 oz, enough to try layering a few together or wear alone. My favorite fragrance is this set is Taunt, as I love the vanilla, amber and bergamot scent. Of course also love the sweet floral smell of suit blooms, too! All these scents are delicious and I canu2019t wait to discover more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a nice set. It comes in a cute sturdy metal tin that makes it easy to keep the fragrances organized and would be perfect for bringing it on the go or while traveling so you can bring your favorite fragrances. I love that the samples are big enough to use numerous times so I can discover my favorites. I like that I can wear each fragrance by itself or that I can layer them to make my own favorite scent. This discovery set already has my favorite Sunlit Blooms, a nice refreshing and revitalizing scent. Milk is a clean and warm scent. Xtra Milk is the spicier and bolder variant of Milk with a nice warm and soft musk scent. Red Dakota is more of a floral scent with Gardenia notes. 03 u201cBlondeu201d was a real discovery for me. I love the spicy and more dark notes with the Black Violet and Saffron. Floral yet bold and mysterious. Love it!  01 u201cTauntu201d is another new favorite discovery with the beautiful dreamy vanilla and floral notes that I just want to wear every day! Anything vanilla does it for me! Overall, this is such a cute set and perfect for discovering all these notes and creating your own fragrance by layering them. This would make a wonderful gift for any perfume lover!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a huge perfume nerd and was excited to try this set from Dedcool of genderless, nontoxic, layerable scents. It comes in a cute little multiuse tray, and contains multiple samples.  I liked the variety of scents-each was distinct, and many were mix and match for layering.  I don't think milk smelled like anything at all, and Xtra milk smelled like fresh laundry but wasn't much for a scent.  My favorites were the bright Sunlit blooms- a light, young non-powdery fruity floral, and Red Dakota, which smelled like bitter grapefruit to me.   Taunt was the closest to a gourmand and was sweet with a hint of Jasmine and rose.  Blonde was much more Jasmine forward, maybe a hint of gardenia, but another solid floral.  It's a nice variety set and I'm sure that there is at least one fragrance likeable to anyone's nose, and layers blend well if you're into fruity floral, or fresh floral, or fresh fruity.  The scents last 4-6 hours and are a bit oily, but inoffensive.  My favorite part of this brand is the very natural,  essential oil like scents. They don't come across as perfumey at all, if you know what I mean- the weird common note that so many department store scents seem to smell like- Idk if it's alcohol or what.  These are NOT that.  They have much more young hippie mama vibes.

reviews.review_title: A great way to build a custom scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who has worked in beauty retail for more than seven years, you would think I would be really into fragrances. But it hasnu2019t been until more recent years that Iu2019ve really dipped my toes into the field. Products like this one are perfect for people like me, who maybe donu2019t know what exactly theyu2019re looking for in a signature scent just yet. Not only do you have six scents to play with in this kit, but they are mild enough that you can mix and match to layer and make your own custom scent which I love. Here are my thoughts on the individual scents:   Fragrance 01 Taunt is such a good smell in my opinion! For anyone who enjoys sweeter smelling perfumes like me, I think this one will be for you. It has vanilla in it, like Sunlit Blooms, but the two scents smell very different in my opinion. Taunt is more subtle I would dare to say, so if you want something that isnu2019t too overpowering, I think you would enjoy this option. It was probably one of my favorites in the sample pack. For the Fragrance 03 Blonde scent, one of the first things to hit when you smell it is probably the musk (which is actually included in all Dedcool scents, just to different varying degrees). Red Dakota was not my favorite. I felt like it was harder to distinguish between the subtle and the forward scent notes than the other fragrances in this bundle, but it didnu2019t smell bad to me. I was lucky enough to have tried Sunlit Blooms previously, and I adore that scent! Itu2019s one of my favorites that I love getting a whiff of throughout my day whenever I have it on. A lovely warm and sweet vanilla scent with white floral undertones, and definitely one of my favorites from this sampler set. Then finally two fragrances that are very similar as well: Milk and Xtra Milk which are meant to be the base fragrances. I definitely smelled the musk in these two options as well, but it wasnu2019t too overpowering. Both were warm and inviting scents that werenu2019t overpowering to my sensitive nose. Long story short

reviews.review_title: Small but fun trying all the scents out
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a 30-year-old professional Makeup Artist, cosmetologist and skin care enthusiast I'm constantly trying new products from different brands. Perfume is truly one of my favorite things to try out and recommend. DedCool has fastly became one of my favorite brands to try out so getting my hands on the sample set was so exciting. First off all these scents are so unique and I can't say I love them all but some of my favorites are Red Dakota and of course extra milk. I love the packaging that this product comes in. I would love to see the bottle sizes be a little bigger. I feel like these are really small sample sizes that they give you for free so it'd be nice to get bigger sizes for the price. Other than that this was really lovely to be able to try out all these scents and know which ones you like and don't like before purchasing a big bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m about to go on a trip and I love having small samples and multiple options for scents. Itu2019s also nice to be able to try out scents before I buy the full or the mini size. When I received this product, the u201cSunlit Bloomsu201d sample was broken and all over the packaging. This wasnu2019t that big of a deal to me because I already have that scent in the full-size, HOWEVER if I didnu2019t already have that scent, I would be pretty upset over this. Not only that but it had small pieces of glass all over the tin. I personally donu2019t like that the samples come in glass bottles because I have broken another sample just by dropping it on my tile floor. I think this could be fixed by using plastic but I could see people complaining about that too. After I cleaned up everything, I think the tin is hard to open. Overall, I would rather just buy a mini. I wouldnu2019t recommend this sample pack.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Samples are my fav way to experience perfume.... for someone who can never make up her mind. Besides the cool box, it's been so fun to play with layering combinations. My fav combo is Xtra Milk + Red Dakota, absolutely perfect and now I need a full size of both so i can use them together!  * Fragrance 01 Taunt - a soft sweet fragrance. It has great staying power - if I sniff my wrist after a few hours it's still there, but it's definitely not strong. i.e. your neighbours will definitely not be able to smell it on you.  *Milk - I know this is a layering fragrance. It's very faint. I do enjoy the smell of it. I've tried layering with it but because of the faintness it gets overpowered by other fragrances quickly. It does seem to make them last a little longer?  *Xtra Milk - Supposed to be a stronger version of milk but I think it smells different. I also enjoy this one and it does seem a little stronger. I love this one for layering as it does stand out more than Milk.  *Fragrance 03 Blonde - Smells floral on opening but changes to a smoky leather scent. Very long lasting.  *Red Dakota - Love this one. Opens with bright citrus notes but that pretty much disappears very soon, the result is a completely different smell. It's like a complex garden. This smells so good on me and lasts a long time.  *Sunlit Blooms - this is a very classic floral and most reminds me of your traditional fragrance on the market. It's VERY long lasting on me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoyed trying out all the scents in this Dedcool Discovery Kit! Unfortunately, one of mine came broken (I think it might have been Madonna but I'm not sure), but I will say that the tin they came in smelled amazing because of it, so I think I would have loved the scent. I think the scent Milk from the kit is definitely best for layering- I personally couldn't smell it super well alone. I did like the Blonde scent a lot! It smells just a little sweet- it's a bit hard to describe but it's a really nice, understated scent and I enjoy it a lot. I did get two Blondes in my kit. My favorite scent in the kit was definitely Red Dakota. It smells a little citrusy and floral and I absolutely love it. It's definitely a lighter scent but it still has some complex notes- I really enjoy it. The last scent I have in the kit is Taunt. This scent comes off as a little warm and sweet to me, and it's definitely a more subdued scent like milk. It's another one of my favorites from the kit. I'm a big fan of the packaging for this kit- the tin the perfumes came in is really cute, and I love that I can reuse it afterward! Overall it's a nice kit and it has some really nice scents in it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Dedcool discover scent contains six trial sizes to help you truly experience what Decool has to offer. Fragrance 01 u201cTauntu201d is very sweet which is not something I normally like, but it had just the right amount of vanilla for me to enjoy it almost like a musk. It started off strong but eventually faded to a sweet afternote. Fragrance 03 u201cBlondeu201d almost smells like a hairspray to me in a good way. It had a light floral fragrance. I really liked Red Dakota! It was so fresh, crisp, and citrusy. The burst of citrus hit me and really rejuvenated me! Sunlit Blooms was another sweet fragrance. It was a little stronger than the other scents by Dedcool. It was the perfect blend of a citrusy orange blossom complimented with vanilla. It was like a delicious piece of hard candy almost! Milk had the lightest sweet scent. It was the definition of a personal scent in my opinion. I loved the white musk giving it truly a milk like feel. It was so mild, soft and gentle. It was perfect for an everyday fragrance. Xtra milk was just so nice and refreshing. It was such a clean scent with a hint of sweetness. I love the white musk! I absolutely loved experiencing so many different scents Dedcool had to offer. My favorites had to be between the two Milk fragrances and the Red Dakota. You will not regret trying this discovery set from Dedcool! Trust me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If youu2019re having trouble deciding which to buy, the sampler is the perfect amount of the best selling scents they have. Each one so unique and brilliant. I wore a different one each day and I couldnu2019t pick a favorite. Itu2019s fun to mix and match these scents as well and create something completely unique to you. The delicious vanilla scent in taunt is everything you could ask for if you love something sweet and light. Sunlit blooms is perfect for that warm sunny day. And if youu2019re looking for the perfect date night scent, Blonde is bold and sexy. Use Milk as a layering fragrance to really attract some attention. This company knows perfume and knows what they are doing. The fresh gardenia scent in the Red Dakota is intoxicating. I guarantee youu2019ll have so much fun wearing these as they are or mixing them up. Youu2019ll get so many compliments and youu2019ll feel like youu2019ve got the best kept secret that you canu2019t help but share with everyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently had the pleasure of delving into a perfume sample kit that boasts an enticing array of six distinct scents. Each fragrance in this collection offers a unique olfactory experience, making it a delightful exploration for any perfume enthusiast.  My personal favorite among the selection is Blonde. This fragrance captures my attention with its sweet and feminine notes, creating a delightful and charming aura. As an avid perfume wearer, it instantly became a standout choice for my day-to-day wear.  Milk presents a fuller scent, and in comparison to its counterpart, Xtra Milk, it leans towards a more neutral profile. The subtle differences allow for versatility, catering to various moods and occasions. Xtra Milk, while slightly more masculine to my senses, has earned its place in my collection, proving that fragrances are a personal journey that transcends traditional gender norms.  Sunlit Blooms shares similarities with Blonde but introduces a subtle maturity, making it a suitable choice for special occasions. It strikes a harmonious balance between sophistication and sweetness, creating a unique olfactory experience.  Red Dakota and Taunt left me grappling for words, as they exude a department store perfume quality that is both alluring and difficult to pinpoint. In a positive light, this uniqueness adds an intriguing layer to the overall kit, making it a perfect option for those seeking something hard to define yet captivating.  What sets this perfume sample kit apart is its ability to allow users to experiment with various scents before committing to a full-sized bottle. It serves as a fragrant playground, enabling enthusiasts to discover new favorites and understand the nuances of each perfume. This diversity of scents ensures that there is something for every mood and occasion, making the kit a valuable addition to any perfume aficionado's collection.

reviews.review_title: Good for finding your favorite fragrance
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you are looking to find a fragrance that you love before committing, then Discovery sets are really good way of trying out new fragrances. The DedCool Discovery set is a really good set which offers a variety of scents for one to explore and fall in love with. If you are new to Dedcool, then this would be really good set to try out to begin with.  The Dedcool Discovery set has a diverse selection of fragrances with each having its own unique character and personality ranging from fresh and light to bold and spicy. Whether you prefer floral notes, woody undertones, or something in between, there's something for everyone in this collection. Each scent is expertly crafted using natural, non-toxic ingredients, and is vegan and cruelty-free. This dedication to clean beauty ensures that you can enjoy these fragrances guilt-free, knowing that they are both ethically sourced and environmentally conscious.  I really like the tin box that the Discovery set comes in- very elegant with minimalist design. The box can be repurposed and is even good to carry sample size perfumes when traveling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am an esthetician so I love trying new beauty products, so I have the best recommendations from my clients and friends! That includes fragrance! Using this discovery set is like being in a lab and creating your own perfume every day, itu2019s very unique. You were able to layer all of them and make yourself a signature sent. My favorite is mixing fragrance 01 taunt with extra milk. I always get compliments even hours after application, even when I only do a spray or too. Itu2019s safe to use on your skin, I experienced no irritation. The only thing I would say is to be careful using it on your clothes because it can be a little oily. The packaging is so cute as well, itu2019s this tin box that holds all the samples. Itu2019s so easy to pack in your bag or in yoursuitcase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is such an amazing set of sample fragrances. It has been such an amazing way to better understand what scents, undertones, and types of scents I like. The bottle comes with enough to test out the fragrances to see what you think of it. I also really love the size of the bottles as you can easily throw them in your bag or purse for the day/night as a on the go freshen up fragrance! Perfect for traveling too. All the scents smell great and they offer a variety of types so thereu2019s definitely something that will suit your fancy. It also comes in the coolest tin to hold all of the bottles. After I finish all the bottles, I am going to reuse the tin to hold my crocheting/knitting items! It is so perfect to be reused! I love things that can be used again and again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite scents usually sit between softly sweet to gourmand without going syrupy. I have also worked in the spa industry forever so I love Bergamot, herbaceous, and fresh scents as well. Recently I've ventured out looking for more niche and unique fragrances and this kit for me is it.  The scents from my favorite to least favorite  Xtra Milk- Milk but amplified perfect genderless scent slightly sweet with my chemistry  Sunlit Blooms- A surprising love! I usually run from scent featuring orange anything. This is like sweet orange nectar on a sun warmed flower field ugh so good. Red Dakota- This kit is wonderful for this discovery alone. The bergamot projected immediately bursting with slightly lemony notes and lingering freshness. Unexpectedly good! Taunt- A subtle sweet skin scent that reminds me of dolls or how one would imagine a mannequin smells lol Milk- Strictly for layering now as Xtra Milk is that girl! Blonde- Bold and my least personal favorite. I could smell this all day and the dry down was a little spicy and more woody than expected.  The best Discovery/introduction kit I have come across in a while.The sprayers were a little wonky (more splash than spritz)but the scents impressed me. Plus the travel tin is such a cool fragrance case!

reviews.review_title: Amazing Way to Discovery Your Fave Scents
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As an owner of Dedcoolu2019s Sunlit Blooms, the original Milk layering fragrance, and Xtra Milk, I was super excited to try out more Dedcool fragrances via their discovery set.  I love to be able to wear a subtle fragrance at work as an esthetician, but itu2019s important to me and my clients that I donu2019t smell too pungent. What I love about all Dedcool fragrances is that they smell very u201corganic.u201d Not in an eco kind of way, but in a u201cI woke up like thisu201d kind of way. I did think that including Milk and Xtra Milk in the same set was a bit redundant. I had a lot of fun layering these fragrances together and of course trying them on their own. They are all beautiful, but of course fragrance is very personal. I love a musky, warm, slightly sweet scent, so Taunt and Sunlit Blooms are definitely my favorite, of course layered with Milk and Xtra Milk. But there wasnu2019t a single a scent in this collection that I did not like. I also just really love the ethos of this brand. It seems like Dedcool aims to make the category of fragrance more approachable and customizable. I have loved wearing these scentsevery day and experimenting with combining it with other fragrances. I love that I am able to create a scent that is unique and true to me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Dedcool Discovery Sample Set offers a collection of unique fragrances, each with its own distinct character. While they boast intriguing notes like bergamot, amber, and floral blends, the main drawback is their longevity, as they tend to fade quickly. Despite this, Dedcoolu2019s commitment to sustainability and vegan ingredients adds to the brandu2019s appeal in the niche fragrance market.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first time trying dedcool perfumes! As a perfume enthusiast, I was very happy to try them.  First of, the set comes in a metal box, which is so convenient for storage! I always struggle with where/how to storage little perfume samples whenever I receive or buy them, so this box is the perfect solution! I wish more brands would package them like this.  The discovery set has a good variety of scents, with everyone being sure to find at least one that they like. I personally thought all of the perfumes had a good scent, some more suited for my tastes than others.   The scent u201cTauntu201d is very nice, with notes of bergamot, vanilla and amber. I love vanilla notes in perfumes, so this one is perfect! Itu2019s a very cozy scents, which I think most of the scents in this set qualify as.  The scent u201cBlondeu201d is an interesting one! It has notes of black violet and saffron. At first application it wasnu2019t my favorite, as Iu2019m not a huge flowery perfumes girl, but itu2019s definitely not bad. As time passed it got more subtle and turned into a yummy scent that I can appreciate, even if I wouldnu2019t wear it daily.  u201cRed Dakotau201d is another scent in the set. Like the previous one, it wasnu2019t my favorite, but it is still a solid scent choice that fades into a pleasant cozy scent that would fit for anyone and any time of day. It has the notes of gardenia, amber and bergamot. Itu2019s a more powerful scent compared to taunt or milk.  u201cSunlit Bloomsu201d is a very nice scent. It has notes of orange blossoms, white floral and salty vanilla. At first I didnu2019t think I would like this one, because of the orange note. But it has a lovely scent! Itu2019s very orange forward at first, but fades into a nice wearable scent, with the salty vanilla shining through nicely.   The u201cMilk layering fragranceu201d is very very subtle, with notes of amber, bergamot and white musk. Itu2019s a nice scent, but itu2019s so soft that it doesnu2019t last very long and is hard to pick up/smell. But as a layering fragrance itu2019s really nice. I

reviews.review_text: When I was younger, I would only wear musk scented fragrance until migraines started. Xtra Milk and Milk smell amazing, nostalgic for me; musky and comforting. Blonde was too potent for me and I couldnu2019t tolerate the scent. Taunt vanilla. Red Dakota smells earthy and unflattering to me. Sunlit Blooms is actually the first Dedcool scent I tried months ago and I quickly loved it because its fruity floral scent dissipates pretty quickly so I could reapply if needed and still enjoy. Overall, this kit helped me tap into my fragrance girl era and learn more about what scents work for me and which ones donu2019t.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: DedCool's sample set invites you on a sensorial journey through an exquisite array of fragrances, each meticulously crafted to evoke a distinct mood and experience. Let's explore the diverse range of scents included:  1. **Xtra Milk**: A symphony of universal musk, intensified by the harmonious blend of amber, bergamot, and white musk. This fragrance radiates sophistication and allure, making it a timeless choice for any occasion.  2. **Milk**: Evoking the familiar sensation of warm, clean skin, Milk envelops you in comfort with its delicate fusion of amber, bergamot, and white musk. Perfect for daily wear, it exudes intimacy and tranquility.  3. **Fragrance 01 Taunt**: Embark on a journey of self-discovery with Taunt, a fragrance that combines bergamot, vanilla, and amber to create a captivating aura of confidence and allure. It's a testament to embracing new beginnings and youthful vitality.  4. **Fragrance 03 Blonde**: Intriguing and enigmatic, Blonde captivates with its intoxicating blend of black violet and saffron. This fragrance exudes mystery and allure, drawing you into its seductive embrace with every whiff.  5. **Sunlit Blooms**: Anticipate warmer days ahead with Sunlit Blooms, where the vibrant essence of orange blossom and white floral is complemented by the subtle sweetness of salty vanilla. It's a celebration of sunshine and joy, perfect for uplifting your spirits.  6. **Red Dakota**: Infused with optimism and vitality, Red Dakota bursts forth with the exuberance of gardenia, amber, and bergamot. This fragrance embodies the essence of joy and positivity, brightening even the dreariest of days.  Among these delightful offerings, Sunlit Blooms emerges as a standout favorite, capturing the essence of warmer days with its vibrant blend of orange blossom, white floral, and salty vanilla. Its uplifting aroma embodies sunshine and joy, making it an irresistible choice for brightening any moment.

reviews.review_title: Great Way to Discover New Fragrances
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Dedcool Discovery Set is a fun and useful way to get to try several of Dedcoolu2019s fragrances and decide which ones you like and work for you. The set came with six samples - Taunt, Blonde, Red Dakota, Sunlit Blooms, Milk, and Xtra Milk - all in a nifty little tin container so itu2019s easy to keep them all organized or take with you for traveling. All of them can be worn on their own, or you can layer Milk or Xtra Milk over any of the other four. My favorite of the batch is definitely Taunt, which has notes of amber, vanilla, and bergamot. Itu2019s warm and sensual. It smells a little different but still great with Milk or Xtra Milk layered on top of it as well, so you have three unique smells and ways to wear it. However, the other three scents were only so-so for me. Overall, Iu2019d definitely recommend this discovery set as a way to get to know the Dedcool brand and perhaps even find your new favorite fragrance. Additionally, since some reviews mention this, the samples in my set were all completely filled to the top.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Dedcool discovery set truly offers a scent for everyone.  Fragrance 01- Taunt with its notes of bergamot, vanilla, and amber create a warm inviting scent that almost reminds me of freshly baked gingerbread cookies. Fragrance 03- Blonde has notes of black violet and saffron. It truly reminds me of Springtime, with its soft floral, and earthy notes, with hints of spice. Red Dakota- has a scent of sweet citrus. The gardenia notes in this scent, are more green and less floral, I believe that the bergamot really comes through in this scent. This is my second favorite scent in this discovery set as it smells so fresh and uplifting. Sunlit Blooms- is a unique scent that offers notes of orange blossom, white floral, and salty vanilla. Combined, these create a warm and inviting scent, of what can be described as a citrusy caramel. This is my third favorite scent in the set.  Milk- with its notes of amber, bergamot, and white musk speaks to me as a scent enhancer. Almost like your own scent but amplified. It's very light and inviting, and it layers well with all of the above scents to enhance the notes. Xtra Milk- is my absolute favorite scent of the discovery set. It's Milk intensified. It's warm, cozy, and inviting. I can't describe the exact notes of Xtra Milk, only how it makes me feel. I will never tire of this scent. It's just so soothing and beautiful. I believe that it works with your body's chemistry to create a unique scent, that is especially for you.  The thing that I love about this discovery set, is that all of the scents can be layered to create your very own signature scent and they all complement each other beautifully and last well into the next day on the skin. They're not overpowering, instead, they're head-turning and captivating. I've received so many compliments on these scents with people asking, What are you wearing? You smell divine.  I'm so happy that I have found Dedcool. There is truly no one out there like them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Fragrance 01 Taunt by DedCool is a more feminine scent that strikes a perfect balance between vanilla, floral and fruity notes. Its delicate yet captivating aroma exudes confidence and charm, making it ideal for any occasion.  Milk by DedCool is a captivating fragrance that was loved by both my parents. Its strong amber scent draws compliments and curiosity, making it perfect for any occasion.  Xtra Milk by Dedcool is a delightful fragrance with a warm and comforting scent. I adore layering it with Milk for an extra indulgent and long-lasting aroma that envelops me in warmth and sophistication.  Red Dakota by Dedcool is a captivating fragrance that transports you to a cozy autumn day with its rich, woodsy, and musky notes. Its warm and comforting aroma evokes the essence of fall, making it perfect for embracing the season's vibes with every wear.  Sunlit Blooms by Dedcool is a delightful fragrance reminiscent of a sunny spring day, with its vibrant floral notes and sweet undertones. Its refreshing and uplifting aroma captures the essence of blooming flowers, making it the perfect choice for embracing the joy and renewal of the season.  Saving the best for last, Fragrance 03 Blonde by Dedcool exudes an air of opulence and sophistication with its rich and luxurious scent profile. Its warm and inviting aroma evokes the glamorous ambiance of a fashion show, making it the perfect choice for those seeking to make a statement with their fragrance. This one was my absolute favorite.  The DedCool Discovery Set offers an exceptional opportunity to explore the brand's diverse range of fragrances and discover your perfect scent. With a curated selection of miniature versions of their most popular perfumes, this set allows you to sample each aroma at your leisure, enabling you to identify the scents that resonate most with your individual preferences.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dedcool Discovery set contains 6 samples of dedcool fragrance line. I really like the unique tin packaging which needs a little squeeze to open the tin box. It definitely kept the samples safe . I must say it is an elegant gift that can be given.  The sample scents that are included in the box are 1. Fragrance 01 Taunt. It is a warm and spicy fragrance that is a good choice for day or night. It has notes of bergamot, vanilla, and amber. 2. Fragrance 03 Blonde. It is a woody, spicy scent with notes of black violet, saffron, and juniper berries. It has top notes of juniper berries, pomelo, and saffron, middle notes of accord cuir, black violet, and crystal rose, and bottom notes of blonde woods, raspberry, and vetiver.   3. Red Dakota. It has top notes of clementine and gardenia, middle notes of woodsy notes and amber, and a base note of wild berries. It is a fresh citrus scent with notes of gardenia, amber, and bergamot.   4. Sunlit Blooms. It has notes of white orange blossoms, white floral, and salty. It smells like a little orange juice, vanilla, and salty sea notes, and is a summer scent.  5. Milk Layering Fragrance. It is unisex fragrance that mixes with  body chemistry to create a scent that smells like an enhanced version of your natural musk. It has notes of bergamot, white musk, and amber. 6. Xtra Milk. It is a genderless, vegan, and non-toxic fragrance that has notes of amber, bergamot, and white musk. It is a unique and luxurious fragrance that is meant to elevate your daily scent routine. It is also formulated with enhanced potency and can be layered with other scents or worn alone. All these scents are unique in themselves.  My favorite are Red Dakota and Sunlit Blooms. It is pricey but the scents are amazing.  I like the tin box.

reviews.review_title: Perfect mix of scents to explore your favorite not
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried out the DedCool Discovery set, and I was really impressed! Encased in a beautifully crafted tin box, the set offered six trial sizes - Fragrance 01 Taunt, Fragrance 03 Blonde, Red Dakota, Sunlit Blooms, Milk, and Extra Milk. The tin box, designed to be squeezed from both sides to open, adds a touch of elegance and practicality, making it perfect to carry in my purse. Plus, the reusable tin box adds an eco-friendly element to the set, ensuring it continues to delight long after the fragrances have been savored.  Fragrance 01 Taunt is bold and alluring, balanced perfectly with a touch of amber and white musk. Though initially strong, it settled into a delightful sweet afternote that lingered beautifully.  Fragrance 03 Blonde exudes radiance and positivity, characterized by dominant notes of Black Violet and Saffron. Its floral and spicy essence is invigorating, making it ideal for special occasions like vacations, adventures, or date nights. Sunlit Blooms is a vibrant bouquet of fresh florals, mingling notes of Orange Blossom, White Florals, and Salty Vanilla. Itu2019s the perfect spring or summer scent.  Milk envelops the senses in a comforting embrace of Amber, Bergamot, and White Musk, providing a gentle and soothing aroma suitable for everyday wear. Extra Milk delivers a clean and refreshing scent with subtle sweetness derived from white musk, leaving a feeling of invigoration and upliftment.  However, it is Red Dakota that stole my heart. It offers a mesmerizing fusion of Amber and Bergamot, delivering a refreshing burst of citrus that leaves you feeling revitalized. Great for any occasion, it maintains its presence throughout the day without overpowering the senses. All of these fragrance have the waterless formula which not only enhances their longevity but also makes them travel-friendly and eco-conscious.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin

Milk is a star, in my opinion and Xtra Milk do not differ much in aroma, so I think that these two would be the bases to combine them with all those already mentioned. I'm happy for all the options in this rainbow of perfumes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A scent loved can inspire you, revive your desire, comfort you or send you traveling through time and space of a past memory. The metal container is retro yet modern (a slight challenge to open on the first attempt) but one could just imagine the vast reusability and recyclability of the vessel.
