reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My name is Gabby and I'm a licensed Cosmetologist. I received the DedCool Discovery Set. This was an amazing sample set, personally I find sample sets perfect for customers who are unsure if they want to buy the full-size product. This allowed me to see what the scents would smell like, and I found to scents from Dedcool that I really liked. I found Sunlit Blooms which I already have the full size too. But my favorite out of the scents was Taunt and I'm actually thinking of getting the full size. Out of all the scents I think this is the best one. Blonde would be my last choice out of the set if I had to pick my top three. Taunt has the notes that I gravitate towards, so I'm not surprised that that one is my favorite. I think this is worth getting as a gift for someone if you're on the fence about what scent someone may like. I would give this fragrance set five out of five stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think this perfume sampler set is a must-have for any fragrance enthusiast. This set offers a unique and diverse range of scents that are both captivating and long-lasting. With a selection of six mini perfumes, it allows you to explore and discover your signature scent.  One of the standout features of this sampler set is the high-quality ingredients used in each fragrance. DedCool is known for its commitment to using natural and vegan ingredients, making it a great choice for those who prioritize clean beauty.  Each perfume in the sampler set has its own distinct personality. From the fresh and vibrant scent of Milk to the warm and sensual notes of Sunlit Blooms there is something for everyone. The variety of scents ensures that you can find a fragrance suitable for any occasion or mood.  One aspect to keep in mind is that fragrance preference is subjective, and not every scent in the sampler set may be to your liking. However, the purpose of a sampler set is to explore and try different fragrances, and this set provides a great opportunity to do so.   I saw other reviews mention their sampler set did not have that much perfume in the bottles. I did not have this issue. I recommend this sampler set.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The DedCool 01 Taunt fragrance is a captivating blend of bold and sophisticated notes. Opening with a burst of citrusy freshness, it evolves into a warm, aromatic heart, revealing hints of spice and wood that create a dynamic and inviting profile. The fragrance exudes confidence and modernity, making it suitable for various occasions, from casual outings to formal events. The longevity is commendable, and the sleek, minimalist packaging adds a touch of elegance, enhancing the overall appeal of the product. DedCool 01 Taunt is a versatile and well-crafted scent that not only leaves a lasting impression but also stands out as a distinctive and memorable fragrance experience, making it a solid choice for those who appreciate quality and individuality in their scents.

reviews.review_title: A wondrous cacophony of cozy scents!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am an avid beauty enthusiast. I am a huge lover of all things that smell incredible. I am brought on a journey of wonderful ethereal pseudo-memories and fantasies when a fragrance is delightful. This discover set did just that. This is a case of you must smell it yourself to believe and understand, but I can tell you what was evoked from within me. The star of this set, XtraMilk, is just the most cozy, warmest, most unique layering scent that I have ever smelled or owned. The original Milk is the same, just not as strong. The other fragrances each deserve their own reviews, but each one layered with Milk take you on a journey, to a home away from home. A place where you, the womb, is surrounded by the safest nebulae, and every galaxies whose journey has a new set of feelings and expressions in your universe. I am so impressed and found myself moved emotionally by each of these fragrances. They are brilliant. I highly recommend them if you are a human who loves smelling unique, and who wants to experience an emotional journey through your sense of smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As a perfume lover, I've always wanted to find a wonderful but distinctive scent that would make people associate a certain aroma with me, and therefore I don't like perfumey perfumes that although have a great smile, have no character because everyone wears them.  This discovery kit allows me to create different perfumes for every occasion and to convey my mood through the scent, either by using the products alone or by combining them with each other, especially with Extra Milk. My favorite combination so far was Fragrance 01 Taunt with Extra Milk, (the blend of vanilla with amber, bergamot and white musk is sweet, mysterious and sophisticated) or the Sunlit Blooms if I am looking for something more fresh and floral (perfect for spring or summer).  I definitely recommend it to anyone who wants to create their own scent and get to know the brand better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am such a scent addict that I absolutely love having travel size scents to always take with me on the go. I think this was such a wonderful introduction into the different DedCool scents and really being able to customize and pick out what scents suit you the best. In my honest opinion, DedCool makes some of the most unique scent combinations I think I have ever experienced throughout my years of trying so many perfumes. All of the scents in the pack have their own unique beauty. I can definitely see how you can later multiple scents to create one customized scent. The best way I found to mix different scents, is by putting a spritz, of whichever combination I want to try try, on different zones that I usually apply perfume. The main points I would use is behind my ear, on the decolletage, on both sides of wrists, a shot down my shirt, and I don't even mind adding a little to clothing. Overall, it's hard to rank the scents because each one has their own unique beauty. The only downside to this pack is that there is Milk and Xtra Milk, they smell way too similar for it to make sense that they both in the pack. The both are good base layers to build up the scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been into fragrances and I have picked up the habit of exploring different scents. The set came in this recyclable can (also child proof).  Milk: This was a very sweet and soft perfume. I however felt it did not carry power or last long. Because of this, I tried layering it with all the other fragrances in the set which came out good. I work in health care, and I was able to wear the milk alone without getting complaints from patients about the scent being too strong.  Fragrance 01 u201cTauntu201d: This had a delicious vanilla smell. It was a bit lightweight for me. I think this is a good everyday scent but I would want something stronger for a dinner or a night out.  Fragrance 03 u201cBlondeu201d: This was my favorite. It represents the kind of scents I like. It hit with a bang and had a very spicy and woody but sweet note. I also layered this on top of fragrance 01 u201cTauntu201d and it came out good. This scent lasted all day for me.  Red Dakota: This has a very citrusy smell. I think it was strongest and most potent of all the scents in the sampler box. I wore this out and it lasted all day. Iu2019m not a big fan of citrus scents but Iu2019m sure someone who is will really enjoy it. I would not recommend this if youu2019re sensitive to strong scents  Sunlight blooms: This also had a citrusy scent but it wasnu2019t as harsh as Red Dakota. I enjoyed the vanilla component to it which added a softer edge. I think thatu2019s why it wasnu2019t as harsh. This one also had me sniffing myself. This scent lasted all day.  Xtra Milk: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this scent. The smell is similar to milk, but with an extra pow wow. It lasted longer than milk, almost all day. Itu2019s sweet but not too sweet, cozy, warm, inviting, seductive. I kept smelling myself after I applied it. This might also be my favorite.  One sad part about the scents is that you get nose blind to the scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this variety of dedcool perfume. As a self proclaimed fragrance enthusiast I absolutely loved these scents. The tin was very chic and was easy to transport from bag to bag, which was so convenient having those options at all times. This discovery set came with five scents- The first one being taunt, which is warm and spicy with bergamot vanilla and Amber. This one was my favorite out of the five. The second one was red Dakota. This one was a fresh citrusy fragrance with notes of gardenia Amber and Bergamot I definitely felt very sexy and cool when I wore this one. Third was blonde which was warm and earthy with notes of violet, saffron, and juniper berries. The third and fourth were another milk and extra milk, which I actually really loved because then I didnu2019t need to carry my full bottle around with me. Overall I was very impressed with these perfumes. All of them smelt super good. All of them lasted throughout the day. I love that these are genderless and are really versatile. Iu2019m definitely adding these to my fragrance vault!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love using this discovery set as I can try many scents. This set includes Taunt, Blonde, Red Dakota, Sunlit Blooms, Milk, and Xtra Milk. Every scent has its unique and I can't decide which one is the best because they all smell so good. By far, Xtra Milk has been my favorite. It smells subtle and soothing for everyday use. The packaging is a little bit hard for me to open. The Taunt scent is cozy, and warm. It smells delicious. It smells like vanilla. The Blonde scent is mesmerizing. It is more feminine leaning. The Red Dakonta smells so fresh and zesty. It smells like Mediterranean citrus groves. The Sunlit Blooms smells sweet enough. This scent is like orange blossom which is great for the Spring and Summer. The Milk is a universal musk. It smells clean and warm. Lastly, the Xtra Milk smells so good. I get a lot of compliments whenever I use it. Overall, I love all of them. They are great to use on any occasion. I highly recommend getting this set to try!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This discovery set is wonderful for anyone. You can try out different scents and enjoy each of them or layer them together. I love the sunlit blooms scent that reminds me of walking through a field of flowers and honeysuckles on a warm sunny day.  I love that the milk and extra milk are similar but one of them is a little stronger than the other.  Taunt reminds me of a perfume that you would smell someone wearing at school. The scent is strong and has a punch to it.  The red Dakota fragrance reminds me of winter. Itu2019s a smell that you would think of log cabins, leaves, and fall festivals.  Blonde smells like flowers you would receive for Valentineu2019s Day. This fragrance is more feminine to me.  My favorite scents are Blonde, Sunlit Blooms. These reminded me of my favorite memories walking through gardens and spending time in nature with my loved ones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a content creator with over 10 years experience in the fragrance industry,I have come across many perfume discovery sets and this is by far one of the best kits that I have ever used. The six included scents are all wonderful worn alone,but what I absolutely love about this collection is that every scent can be layered creating endless fragrances,which gives me an entire perfume wardrobe all in a portable tin that I can fit literally anywhere. None of the fragrances are too strong or overbearing and they all complement each other beautifully. I absolutely love that I have the ability to create multiple customized fragrances based on my own personal mood and preference,which may be completely different than anyone else's creation. This is a discovery collection that I would recommend to anyone and everyone,as the possibility are endless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who has been getting into fragrances much more over these past few years, I find that sample kits - like this - are right up my alley, in helping me to discover which fragrances I like most.  That being said, I was really excited to try this kit out for myself. I definitely wanted to love this, but I just can't.  I enjoy half this kit. The base layering fragrances - Milk and Xtra Milk - are wonderful. So is the delightful fragrance called Taunt, which made me smell like a Dreamsicle in Summer  As for the other three fragrances, they are just not for me. Sunlit Blooms is an overpowering floral scent that was so strong the scent turned my stomach. Red Dakota smelled amazing in a masculine way. Sadly, after 10 minutes of wearing it, I was itchy everywhere, so it must have Raspberry in it. Blonde has Raspberry in it, so I couldn't even test it.  This kit is a nice way to try scents to discover which one works for you. I learned that Taunt is the DedCool scent for me. That's also the scent that DedCool's fragrance recommended me as well.

reviews.review_title: Fun, smells good, and non-irritating to skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who is really into beauty products and boosting myself confidence, I was so excited to try the DedCool Discovery Set. DedCool approaches introducing fragrance in a new way that I really enjoyed. Not only are the scents made from natural ingredients, but there were six different ones that I could mix and match which was so fun! I've been searching for the right fragrance that suits me. It has been hard for me to find one because I have a sensitive nose that does not like the smell of chemicals, and sensitive skin that would get rashy when in contact with perfumes. I have not had this problem with with the DedCool perfumes. My favorite is Xtra Milk followed by Sunlit Blooms and I really like them together. My least favorite was the Red Dakota. Even though I didn't really like that one, it still smelled decent with Xtra Milk. I also really liked how Taunt smelled warm, sweet, and vanilla-y. The scents lasted a really long time and I got a lot of compliments! I would recommend this for anyone who wants to try finding a great natural smelling perfume. I am so glad I tried them!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m excited about the DedCool Discovery Set! Getting to smell and test different fragrances in order to find the right one for me is an absolute dream. DedCool made it easy to try their products

This set is absolutely adorable, coming in a beautiful tin tray I will continue to use for all my perfume samples. The scents include Red Dakota, Milk, Taunt, Xtra Milk, Blonde, and Sunlit Blooms. I haven't had much experience with Dedcool and was absolutely stunned to realize just how much I love these scents, especially Red Dakota and Blonde. Red Dakota is a juicy, fresh scent that when paired with Milk, becomes a slightly sweet fruity floral. Blonde is more earthy, spicy, and becomes slightly toned down when pairing with Milk. I immediately went out and purchased travel sizes of them with how much I kept going back to smell them throughout the day. Pairing and layering works beautiful as well, especially with the inclusion on Milk. My one complaint is that I wish there was another scent included that wasn't one of the EDPs. I think for purposes of a sampler set, I would prefer the original Milk EDP for layering and instead of Xtra Milk include Madonna Lilly.

reviews.review_title: Great way to figure out your favorites
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoyed this fragrance discovery set. These are all good scents it was very hard to pick a favorite because I loved them all so much. These fragrances are all good and lasting. They're good for layering or wearing by themselves. Also so convenient for being in a tin which is great for on the go or just storing them in general. If I had to pick a favorite I loved Red Dakota it just really stood out. This is an easy blind buy because these are all great and there are so many choices in the discovery set which makes it so worth it. You will most likely fall in love with these fragrances like I did. I love the variety also because there is something for everyone in there. Easy to travel with and just so many benefits. It's so easy to pack in your purse and can be worn in many different settings and times of the year.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: truly love this ! I travel alot ! its perfect to mix and wear.  all the scents are great ud83dudc4d  truly love it. I also like to spray on my wrist and mix.  They are all light fragrance and I find that it very nice to wear everyday.  I definitely think it great for all ages !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I first was smelling each scent I was bit nervous. Itu2019s my first time really getting to try Dedcoolu2019s fragrance, and I have heard nothing but great things. Now imagine to my surprise that 5 out of the fragrances 6 are my favorites. Starting off with Fragrance 01 Taunt, when you first spray you are greeted with the top notes of amber very strong and masculine. Then as the heart and base notes kick in you are wrapped in bergamot with hints of vanilla making this scent feel warm and inviting. On to fragrance 2 also known as Fragrance 03 Blondie, this is one the top and base notes of black violet and saffron are very strong. Kind of reminds me of walking into the perfume section in Macys. Next up is Red Dakota just like taunt the top note of amber comes flying at you then you are engulfed by the heart and base notes of bergamot and gardenia creating this sweet hypnotic heavenly scent. Third to last is Sunlit Bloom the top note you are hit with from the first spray is orange blossoms, then with the heart and base notes you are transported to the end of spring start of summer sweet, floral, and just happy. The second to last is Milk. The base note of this fragrance has to be white musk  while the heart and base notes are bergamot  mixed with hints of amber. Itu2019s very much a combination between masculine and feminine.  Itu2019s sweet, musky, refreshing and intoxicatingu2026 Obsessed ud83dude0d. Last but not least is xtra milk. The top, heart and base note seems to stay the same of bergamot, amber and white musk, but it seems the amber and white musk are more dominant creating a hint of sweet but more masculine scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Yes, please! These discovery sets are a genius, not to mention a lifesaver, money-saver and a bit of a luxury.    Every time a brand launches a fragrance sampler set, I MUST have it. My first love growing up was perfume. I was fascinated by different fragrance profiles that put me in different moods and ignited unknown desires and feelings in my heart of hearts and made me curious to learn about different cultures and faraway places. Then in my teenage years I worked the perfume counter and were those the most fragrant times of my life?    Decades have passed and I always have at least 60-70 different perfumes in my rotation to match the weather, my outfit, the mood, the climate or sometimes even my choice of music. I guess you could say I'm a full-blown fragrance junkie.   Really glad scent samples are becoming the new norm: it gives the wearer a better idea of how scents work with their individual body chemistry not to mention each vial contains enough juice for use over several days if not weeks.    No longer need to go to the perfume counter to sample everything in one go, just get a set and trial everything in the comfort of your home to see which scent inspires You!   I love Dedcool, I love their ethos, been a big fan of Taunt and now I found a new favourite thanks to this nifty little sampler set that's housed in a fully recyclable (upcyclable/reusable) sleek tin box. Just punch the sides and slide it open, you'll find 6 generous vials with spray heads attached for convenience on the go.   Taunt is still my No1 from this lot with Sunlit Blooms becoming a close second. As a lover of white florals, amber and gourmands, it's no surprise I'm taken by these two the most.   Blonde is another standout scent along with Red Dakota the former being a love-child of Black Saffron and Ombre Leather while the latter having mostly fruity-floral notes in an almost vintage way.    Milk and Xtra Milk are my least favourite of this batch, mostly because they don't

reviews.review_title: So cute and so many options!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging really got me here, this was very thought out. Again it's very simple and clean, but at the same time it is very detailed when it comes to explaining the products and very neat. Pop off the cardboard sleeve and there is the cutest little metal tin that can be reused, and 6 of DedCool's signature scents. All of these start with a strong alcohol smell, but quickly transform into another world quickly once that settles. Their own little worlds. There is an oil left when you spritz them all as well that helps them last longer. Fragrance 03 blonde - orange and clean Red Dakota- Grapefruit and April showers Taunt - sweet like candy, vanilla, a little like Caramel Sunlit blooms - citrus and sweet, this by far is my favorite out the bunch. Milk - clean, light, and very delicate, I could see why when they made Xtra milk they made it stronger, this one is barely there, but it makes it my favorite for layering. Xtra milk - made my mouth water, the freshest out the bunch, would be prefect for spring. All in all these scents blew me away and the thought of layering them with all my other perfumes, the combinations are endless and I'll be enjoying not only that, but the all the people who are gonna be asking me, what is that? What are you wearing?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hello! As a beauty enthusiast, I love testing products and giving my honest opinion on how well these beauty items have worked for me. I tried the Decool discovery set, which came with Taunt, Blonde, Red Dakota, Sunlit Blooms, Milk, and Xtra Milk. This set was so fun to try, especially since all of scents are super unique! Milk and xtra milk are musky scents with good staying power. Taunt is a vanilla amber scent and Blonde is a spicier scent. Sunlit Blooms is a more citrusy scent and Red Dakota is a more amber citrus scent. I loved all of the scents and feel like the sample will last a long time! I feel as if the citrusy scents will be better in the spring/summer and the musky scents are more fall/winter for me! I am so happy I discovered the Dedcool brand and plan to repurchase in the future!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love DedCool Discovery Set scent of all of the perfumes, and will likely buy a full size version in the future, my favorite was Fragrance 01 u201cTauntu201d.  I have seen in social media how many people LOVE Ded Cool and I didn't want to buy a big bottle before making sure I liked it , so getting the samples is a brilliant idea. I found the scents to be very close in smell and all very light and sweet, I am not a huge vanilla fan but I did enjoy Sunlit Blooms, my daughter loves Milk and she wants to purchase a full bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been a licensed Esthetician for over four years and a Registered Nurse for over 30 years and am always looking for products and cosmetics to improve my personal appearance as well as my skin health. My appearance is very important to me as far as my clients first impression.  I try all products on myself before I recommend to my clients based on skin type so I know how it looks feels and smells DedCool Discovery Set is a great way to try many of the amazing DedCool fragrances and mix and match them depending on the time of day, mood etc.  All of the DedCool fragrances ar very uplifting and sensual and can be worn by men and women and can be layered.  I love that this set comes in a wonderful tin that can also be repurposed.  It is a little tricky to open the first time, you have to squeeze on the two sides to lift the lid, so it is child safe which is great because of the small glass spray bottles, and the tin also protects them if the tin accidently gets dropped.  Great way to find your favorite scent or makes a great gift.

reviews.review_title: I truly love them all! Such mesmerizing scents!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a 34 year old beauty enthusiast from Northern Kentucky! Ok let me tell you about these Dedcool Scents ! The first one I am going to brag about is the Milk perfume!This milk perfume has Amber ,Bergamot and white musk !It isnu2019t to strong of a scent! The next scent Iu2019m going to brag about is the extra Milk scent ! It also has Amber , Bergamot and white musk but this Xtra milk is more concentrated so itu2019s a stronger smell! But not to over powering ! The next scent Iu2019m going to be talking about is the Red Dakota ! It smells of Gardenia, Amber and Bergamot! But if paired with the xtra milk it makes it a more luxurious smell! The next fragrance I will be talking about is u201cFragrance 01u201d Taunt u201c which I think is my favorite! Smells of Bergamot, Vanilla and Amber ! Then last but not least the Sunlit blossoms smells like white orange blossoms at high noon!Then there is Blonde which smells of Black Violet and Saffron! Extremely yummy fragrances! I truly enjoyed them all!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This set has six fragrances all with different stories. Milk is an amber, bergamot, white musk blend that smells luminescent, ethereal, and creamy. Xtra milk is a tad bit stronger with an emphasis on the white musk note. Taunt ended up being my favorite itu2019s a creamy but not too sweet citrusy vanilla. Sunlit blooms reminded me of having a sweet creamy orange ice cream at the beach with notes of salty vanilla and orange blossom. Red Dakota is tart, citrusy, and zesty like a refreshing lemon water. Blonde reminded me of walking through a cemetery on a sunny day and seeing all the graves adorned with tons of violets, roses, and it starts to get late so you grab your leather jacket to wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a thirty some year old who lives in the city, I like to wear fragrances that make me memorable, and I can spot a lovely fragrance when I smell one. These scents by DedCool will have at least one new scent for keeps. The set comes with 6 scents, and I loved Red Dakota that smelled like a grapefruit mimosa and Taunt which smells sweet and elegant. Even though the scents are unisex, I can say that Milk, Blonde and Xtra milk could fit a male better. Sunlitblooms was fresh and clean a very nice scent for summer! Xtra milk has sweet notes that made me sneeze quite a bit. The scents stayed on me and my clothes a long time. I like that they feel to be oil based, meaning they are high quality and long wearing. A little goes a long way, so the set can last for a while! The packaging is a cute metal box that can be reused.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dedcool discovery set is the bomb. I love all the scents and there is something for everyone. I love this brand and its ethos. Xtra milk is my fave but I love the scent notes of milk and the others. Itu2019s also the perfect gift for anyone who prizes extravagant notes.

I love that the sample said, gave quite a range, and also come in a reasonable cute TIN, which makes it ideal for carrying around! it really emphasizes the idea that they are environmentally friendly by offering a packaging that is reusable in something else. I also appreciate it that all of them were sent in glass Iu2019ve gotten some in plastic, but just felt wasteful and less environmentally friendly. I think two of my favorite scents with the set are TAUNT and milk. For TAUNT I really liked how fresh and light and yet still dark the scent was. For milk I like that itu2019s kind of like layering on my skin so itu2019s nothing overpowering something that seems natural and unique to me. I did appreciate the range of sense inside the small sample set. I found that I could have a different scent for a different mood that Iu2019m in, and I could find it all within the same set. I would definitely recommend this to others who enjoy different scents and would definitely get again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The DedCool Discovery Set offers a tantalizing array of non-toxic, vegan, genderless fragrances with an oil-based formula. Featuring a set of six best-selling scents, this collection allows you to mix and match to discover your own unique fragrance. Personally, I found that these fragrances lingered longer on my clothes than on my skin, with an intimate and skin-close scent profile that lasts until the next day.   DedCool isn't for everyone; it's tailored for sophisticated perfume users familiar with molecular aromas, layering techniques, and the appreciation of beauty in fragrance. However, for those willing to delve into its intricacies, this set provides an excellent introduction to the brand's ethos and offerings.   My personal favorite combination from the set is fragrance 01 Taunt mixed with XMilk. This blend is simply enchanting, evoking sweetness and allure with hints of innocence and cleanliness reminiscent of vanilla candy, akin to the scent of baby skinu2014utterly adorable. Overall, the DedCool Discovery Set is a fantastic opportunity to explore and experiment with six uniquely captivating scents, ultimately finding your perfect olfactory match.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The variety of scents and the amount in this tin is an amazing value! Plus the tin is super cute, I'll defintely be saving it. All six scents are complex and luxurious, and there's only two that I don't fall under my personal scent preferences. My favorites are Taunt, Xtra Milk, and Sunlit Blooms. I love vanilla and amber so Taunt is right up my alley. It's sweet while still being mature and alluring. Xtra Milk has that you-but-better scent. It's clean, comforting, and intriguing all at once. I'm surprised by how much I enjoy Sunlit Blooms since I don't usually go for floral/fruity essences. When I first sprayed it on my wrist, I kept bringing it up to my nose over and over throughout the day because it's just so good! The scent makes me think of the transition from the end of summer, into the start of autumn. The two fragrances in the sample that I don't plan to wear are Blonde and Red Dakota since they don't feel very me. They're still great scents though, I'll be gifting them to a friend. The sample-size bottles are a lovely glass and they spray into a fine-mist. I'm going to stash some in a purse, travel bag, and my car so I can smell amazing anywhere!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These discovery scents are to die for. They come in the cutest tin. They all fit in snug in there and when you open it you squeeze both sides to slide the top off. Comes with the scents xtra milk, blonde, milk, taunt, red dakota and sunlit blooms. These are deluxe size samples and they are filled to the top so you dont feel skimped out on. I'll start with the xtra milk. This scent is soft and powdery. The sunlit blooms is a fresh flowery scent. Red dakota is spicy and sweet. Milk is similar to xtra milk, they are both alike with milk just being a softer version. Blonde smells like nuts and berries with a woodsy smell to it too. Taunt smells sweet like bubblegum. Its fresh and flowery too. I have fallen in love with dedcool and these discovery scents. Each vial sprays a decent amount each time despite its size so great spraying action there. These are genderless so anybody can wear them but i feel like they were made just for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: DedCool Discovery Set is a masterpiece! Each and every scent in this set is sophisticated and unique, I am in love! #1 Taunt is so candylike, it's like walking into a bakery! It's warm and dreamy, the vanilla comes through so soft and delectable! Sunlit Blooms is floral, it's like a spring picnic in a field of flowers. Blonde is a bold and whispy musk, it's spicy and makes me feel sexy everytime I put it on! Red Dakota is like citrus and seduction, it makes you want to be flirty and fun! Milk is a warm musky smell but it has a spicy, sexy kick to it! Last but certainly not least is Xtra Milk this is a sexy, seductive, passionate night with your lover! It's delectable, it's like relaxation In a bottle to me! I am in love with all of the DedCool scents, each one is truly unique and elevates your mood in different ways! Its a must have!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: DedCool is a vegan, cruelty-free, and unisex fragrance line that offers a variety of scents for different moods and occasions. The sampler includes six mini bottles of their most popular fragrances: Taunt, Blondie, Red Dakota, Sunlit Blooms, Milk, and Extra Milk. Each fragrance has its own personality and charm, and I enjoyed experimenting with them.  Taunt is a spicy and seductive scent, with notes of vanilla, amber, and sandalwood. It is perfect for a night out or a romantic date. Blondie is a sweet and floral scent, with notes of jasmine, bergamot, and musk. It is ideal for a sunny day or a casual brunch.  Red Dakota is a warm and earthy scent, with notes of fig, amber, and cedarwood. It is great for a cozy evening or a relaxing weekend.  Sunlit Blooms is a fresh and fruity scent, with notes of grapefruit, orange blossom, and rose. It is suitable for a spring morning or a cheerful mood. Milk is a soft and creamy scent, with notes of vanilla, coconut, and tonka bean. It is comforting and soothing, and can be worn anytime.  Extra Milk is a rich and decadent scent, with notes of caramel, almond, and vanilla. It is indulgent and delicious, and can be layered with other fragrances for a unique twist.  I loved the diversity and quality of the DedCool fragrance Sampler, and I think it is a great way to discover new scents and express yourself. The fragrances are long-lasting, subtle, and sophisticated, and they can be mixed and matched to create your own signature scent. I highly recommend this sampler to anyone who loves fragrances and wants to try something different and exciting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Dedcool's discovery set is full of unique scents that each showcase the thought and creativity of the brand. Every scent included has its character much like the people who will eventually wear them. It was a fantastic journey through them all and there was not a single scent I did not enjoy. They all worked well on their own or layered.  My favorite of the scents included was Red Dakota. Red Dakota smells like a citrus-fueled walk through the deserts of Arizona to me. It is beautiful and a little dry. I could not stop smelling myself while wearing it and received a lot of compliments. It was really hard not to gatekeep the name of this scent.  A close second in the set was Taunt. If I paired this with a thought process it would be, this scent is for the grown women. It is sensual and romantic. Teasing hints of warm vanilla and amber while flirting with florals. Bergamot comes in as well but not as strongly as it does in milk or extra milk. It is just all around a sexy scent.  Blonde was also included in my set. I found it to be a pretty scent. I did enjoy it but it is not a scent I would often reach for as it is lighter than what I normally wear. I found that I picked up most heavily on the violet and juniper In the scent. It could make a wonderful summer scent when I might want to reach for something a bit lighter.  Sunlit bloom is an extraordinarily fresh scent. It smells to me like an orange creamsicle but not as sweet. It was very lovely.  Milk and Xtra Milk are great for layering. I like them on their own as well but they do better with layering in my opinion. Both are bergamot-heavy and the musk comes in on the backend.  Scents are very important to me, as I tend to match mine to my mood and I am confident within this discovery set I will always have a scent to match any mood I am feeling. My only complaint would be that many of the tester bottles leak so if they do not remain upright they will leak from the top.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a fantastic discovery set! It is perfect for those wanting to sample different scents before committing to a full-size bottle. Each one boasts a unique aroma that has me completely obsessed. They come neatly packaged in a portable tin, ideal for on-the-go use or for traveling.  Now, let's explore the scents:  1. Fragrance 01 Taunt: With Bergamot, Vanilla, and Amber, this fragrance is sweet and delicate, perfect for everyday wear.  2. Fragrance 02 Blonde: Featuring Black Violet and Saffron, this scent is mesmerizing with subtle woodsy touches, making it a favorite of mine.  3. Red Dakota: Combining Gardenia, Amber, and Bergamot, this fragrance is fresh and captivating, ideal for sunny days.  4. Sunlit Blooms: With Orange Blossom, White Floral, and Salty Vanilla, this scent is a beautiful blend of citrus and sweetness, perfect for daily wear.  5. Milk: Amber, Bergamot, and White Musk create a delightful scent, perfect for wearing alone or layering with other fragrances.  6. Extra Milk: This unique scent has a cozy, sweet aroma, making it a must-have addition to any collection.  I love that these fragrances are genderless, allowing me to share them with my husband. Overall, this discovery set offers a diverse range of scents that I highly recommend exploring. Trust me, these fragrances are truly remarkable!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The DedCool Discovery set is so good for finding your a signature scent! Fragrance 01u201dTauntu201d is absolutely to die for. Itu2019s a light warm vanilla that wraps you in a hug once it hits your nose. It layers perfectly with the scent xtra milk for that little bit of added warmth. 03u201dBlondeu201d is a unique warm spicy scent that I fell in love with and I usually only go for sweet scents. No matter your taste you will love 1 or more in this set. Itu2019s perfect for combining to make your own personal scent. Sunlit blooms mixed with milk creates a warm beach vibe. These are waterless so the wear time is super long on them too which I enjoy. The only bad thing is they can be a little greasy on some surfaces when sprayed. I would recommend this set to anyone looking to find a new everyday fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The set offers a diverse range of scents that are truly unique and captivating. Each perfume in the set is a masterpiece, with its own distinct blend of notes that creates a multi-dimensional olfactory experience. This set covers a wide spectrum of fragrance profiles, making it suitable for various preferences and occasions. What I appreciate most about the Discovery Set is the versatility it offers. It's perfect for exploring and finding the perfect scent for any mood or setting. The packaging of the Discovery Set is also elegant and minimalist, reflecting the sophistication of the perfumes within. It makes for a wonderful gift for anyone who appreciates fine fragrances. Overall, I highly recommend ths Discovery Set to anyone seeking a collection of high-quality, gender-neutral perfumes. It's a fantastic way to explore a variety of captivating scents and find the perfect fragrance for any occasion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: DedCool Discovery Set mini fragrance scents, are decent. They are perfect for on the gos. I love that I was able to smell the scents as soon as I opened the package. However, I was a bit annoyed when I had to claw at the case that the scents were in. It was a bit of a nuisance to get it open. And then once the case that the mini fragrance were then open, a lot of the fragrance went flying. I love the outside packaging, it was nicely done, especially when it has the fragrance scents outside so I knew exactly where they were when opening the case. But the discovery fragrances scents do not last. You would need to continue to spray them on to get a smell throughout the day. And spraying on perfume can get annoying especially when you have to continue to pray it. I wouldnu2019t recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Dedcool Discovery set contains six fragrances and it's perfect to decide which fragrances you like the most.  Taunt 01  This fragrance is a really sweet you can smell the vanilla but it's not that strong. I really love this scent and once you spray it on the skin the vanilla scent isn't so sweet it's just the perfect scent you can smell the vanilla and the Amber more than the bergamot. This is a very warm sweet scent.  Sunlight Blooms  This perfume has a floral scent it's pretty strong it's not bad I'm really not a huge fan of strong floral scents but this one's it's pretty okay. This one has orange blossom, white floral, and salty vanilla you can definitely smell the white floral more than anything I can't really smell that much of the salty vanilla or the orange blossom because the white floral really overpowers the whole scent. Once the scent has settled in your skin you can smell a little bit of the orange blossom but it's still has a very floral scent. After you've been wearing it for quite some time you can smell a little bit of the vanilla. But this is definitely a scent for people that are huge fan of floral scents. This is a perfume that I would wear for like a dinner meeting or something like that. Definitely not a scent I would wear every day. Also a little goes along the way because it has a very strong floral scent spraying two to three sprays is a perfect more than that it's just way too much the floral scent will be way too strong.  Blonde 03  This fragrance has black violet and saffron I find this scent pretty bold it's not a sweet or a clean scent it has a bit of a floral scent but it's not a strong floral scent. I find that this perfume goes well for like when you're in a business meeting or office meeting it's a pretty bold scent that's the only way I can describe it. It's s not your everyday perfume definitely for occasions like work meetings and stuff like that. It's a perfume you would wear whenever you want to look professional and smell

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dedcool discovery set is such a fun set with all the perfumes that I love playing with. It layers perfectly with milk and xtra milk. My favorite is blonde due to its black violet and saffron scent. When I layer that with xtra milk it smells intoxicating and I get stopped on the street for people to ask me what I was wearing! I go so excited because I typically wear usual girly sweet scents and I feel dark and mysterious when wearing the dedcool discovery scents. I love sunlit blooms as it is a white floral and salty vanilla scent. The uniqueness of these perfumes in the discovery set gives me so many options to play mix and match to find my own style and mood through these scents. I enjoy carrying them around in my purse while I travel to different locations for work.

reviews.review_title: Scents that lasts like no other
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am happy with the sampler set. The metal packaging is lovely, and the sample sizes are good enough for a complete experience with the scents. It's new to me that these perfumes don't use water, which makes them feel kind of oily on the skin. I think this plays a role in their longevity, as they stay for a long time on the skin compared to other fragrances. Now, let's talk about the scents:  - Taunt: I really love this perfume. I can definitely smell the vanilla and bergamot, but I couldn't catch the amber. It lingers for a long time and smells good.  - Blond: The notes are delicious, and I love how it performs. I can see myself wearing this one.  - Sunlit Bloom: Once you spray this one, you can smell the citrus and white flowers. It was pretty strong for my liking, but as it cools down, the vanilla comes through, making it smell beautiful.  - Red Dakota: The opening notes are citrusy, coming from the bergamot, and then you can definitely get the gardenia and amber. I love it.  - Milk and Xtramilk: I loved the musk and amber in them, but for me, I could barely smell both of them. I was disappointed by these two

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I tested all of these for a week and I must say I really enjoyed all six. My favorites are XTRA MILK + Sunlit Blooms + Red Dakota. XTRA Milk did an amazing job creating perfume oils and did a huge hit with me but I find them all intriguing! I love the purity of the ingredients and I could wear these scents anytime, day or evening. Itu2019s nice they have a sample pack. They aren't over-powering and they don't give me a headache like most perfumes which I loved about this product. I will definitely recommend this Dedcool perfume to all ages especially if you are looking for long lasting scents. You canu2019t go wrong with any of these scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: First off, I love dedcool and its whole brand! The packaging is environment friendly and ingredients are clean. Thatu2019s something we can all appreciate. The discovery set is such an affordable way to see what scents you may like. My favorite scents are Xtra milk and Taunt! Both are really subtle but noticeable. If you want a conversation starter, these are for you! I get way too many compliments on how I smell and I even forget I have it on at times. Nothing too headache inducing, which is something I have a problem with a lot of other perfumes. I work 12 hours and a lot of the time, I just want to smell fresh and clean to get through the day. Sunlit Blooms is the strongest scent of the bunch. For me, itu2019s too citrusy for my liking but others may love! Do yourself a favor and grab this set, you might find your new signature scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best way to Discover which Dedcool scents you like without purchasing each of the scents in the bigger bottle first is to get this Dedcool Discovery Kit, but if your like me you will discover you like them all because each one is different and unique in their own way. You will also discover that layering the scents creates a whole other world of aroma to discover. In this kit you will find Milk which is a light layering fragrance and Xtra milk which is a tad heavier than Milk, both have a citrusy warm musk scent. My absolute favorite scent in the bunch is definitely Sunlit Blooms which has notes of orange blossom, floral, and vanilla but not the normal vanilla that your use to smelling itu2019s more of a salty vanilla that smells so good. Coming up as my next favorite would have to be Taunt which has the warm vanilla citrusy smell. For the more floral lovers there is also Red Dakota which has a warm gardenia smell with a twist of spicy citrus and Blonde that has black violet and saffron. I created a layer that I love but Iu2019m keeping it to myself, you can discover yours on your own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have become a huge scent enthusiast, but I struggle with migraines so, that can make it difficult to find scents that won't trigger a migraine. Dedcool is a clean brand and they use very high quality ingredients. That definitely shows. These scents are great for me. They layer so nicely and don't trigger my migraines. The scents are very yummy on their own, but genius when layered. Sunlit blooms is the strongest of these scents and it will definitely overpower upon initial opening. The packaging is so cute and can be reused for so many different things. I have been loving it for my purse. This would make a great gift for someone who wasn't sure what scent profile they enjoy the most or someone looking to add some more fragrances to their collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m thoroughly impressed by the scent profiles Dedcool has to offer. This trial set and the featured signature fragrances of the brand offer a wonderful glimpse into the brand's mission to offer a fragrance experience in such a unique and palatable fashion. This set truly provides an indulgence for everyone with varying tastes and fragrance preferences. Fragrance 01(taunt)and Sunlit Blooms are sensual musks that are warm and enticing for those looking for decadent florals that are sultry and piquant. Fragrance 03 and Red Dakota are good balance of bright and zesty florals with brooding middle notes from the black violet and gardenia profiles. Milk and Xtra Milk are Amber potent fragrances that are adaptive and luscious balanced with bergamot and white musk which together create an alluring intensity.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely in love with these scents. Such a great way to try them all and layer on top of each other. Already knew I loved milk and red dakota, but fave layering combo I haven't heard anyone talk about is taunt + madonna lily, never gotten so many compliments on a perfume ever. Do urself a favor + try them allllll

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These smell amazing, but definitely listen to the reviews that say they come partially full. Mine were filled to all different levels, which is disappointing for the price point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: while there were some scents I liked, all were quite similar. One of the bottles was a different scent then what was listed and two of them were half full.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty disappointed the small vials were half empty when I received them. Definitely not worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Cute packaging, nice scents. To address other reviews - you do get Milk (and itu2019s quite nice) and the samples I received were full. The case is terribly cute too. As for the fragrances Iu2019ve only tried 2 - milk is delightful, not overly lactonic, and to me Blonde smells like soap.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this set really highlights how similar all of these fragrances smell. only taunt stands out as something different compared to the others. milk is not included, but it smells very similar to the others - everything has a bergamot or sharp citrus peel zingy overtone and a damp newspaper or printer ink undertone. i do not get gardenia or amber or musk or any of the other notes listed on any of these fragrances. taunt has a cloudy soft vanilla over the citrus, a very hazy soft vanilla not - too sweet. not really unisex, just in general kind of boring or uninteresting. not well blended or balanced. not exciting in any way, but also not simple in the sense that an uncomplicated scent can still be very inviting. just very underwhelming and i can't get past the chemical inky dusty musty wet paper undertone on all of the scents.  packaging is a dud too. along the lines of the tiny samples Sephora used to give out, which is reasonable if they are free samples. they component is poor quality and seems to allow the product to leak or evaporate - they arrive half empty and there is very little product to begin with. i understand a sample set, but the price is steep for very little.  really just unimpressive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells are great, but bought the tin and they came half emptyu2026. Was sent a replacement and it was also half empty? They also dry up really fast in the bottles. When I originally bought this last year the tin was $30 and now itu2019s $40. Save your money and go smell in store for a ful bottle!

reviews.review_title: D+G LB meets Angel Muse - spicy mature bergamot!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Fabulous, sophisticated fragrances. If you like bergamot, then these are your jam. Think mature D+G Light Blue meets spicy Angel Muse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The fragrances are nice, but the packaging is a fail. The tin it comes in is cute, but it gets stuck and itu2019s nearly impossible to open and close properly. The little perfume sprays are also very cheap. They came a little ununiform, like some of them had spilled.
